anya-e0806n2:2_1: atettha vutyanukūlāya pañcikāya vā bhavitabbaṁ, pañcikānu kūlāya vuttiyā vā,
anya-e0806n2:2_3: tathāhi vuttiyaṁ-‘ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti ettakameva pakativisesanavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:2_4: pañcikāyantu tabbisesana vasena ca paccayatthavisesanavasena ca attho dassito,
anya-e0806n2:2_7: tathā byācikkhissāma ‘‘yadi panettha vutyānukūlā pañcikā bhaveyya paccayatthapakkho jahitabbo siyāti ‘te…pe… ekānekatthesu’ti ca,
anya-e0806n2:2_8: tena…pe… yojaniya’nti ca etesaṁ jahitabbatāya bahupāṭhavilopo āpajjati,
anya-e0806n2:2_9: yadi pana pañcikānukūlā vutti bhaveyya vuttiyaṁ kiñcimattaṁ pakkhipitabba mattameva siyāti bahuvilopāpatti (na) hotīti etesaṁ dvedve honti ekāne katthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti vuttiyā bhavitabba’’nti,
anya-e0806n2:2_11: sutte ‘dvedvekānekesu nāmasmā’ti vuttattā ‘ekānekesū’ti idaṁ paccayavisesanaṁ vā yujjati
anya-e0806n2:3_3: tathāhyekādīsu bhavantā pakativāccānamevekattādiabyati rittaatthamattādīrūpānaṁ jotakā syādayo kathamekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā aññato siyunti yathāvuttanāmavisesākkhepo,
anya-e0806n2:3_4: tathā itthiṇādippaccayādīnampi pana pakativisesānupādānepi yato dhātvādi vāccottho natthi, sāmatthiyā tato,
anya-e0806n2:3_5: dhātutyādyantehi tyādyanta vāccehi (potthake) na honte vittipaccayā,
anya-e0806n2:3_7: yadetampakativisesanaṁ tadāpi sāmatthiyeneva ekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā tajjotanāya bhavantā syādayo kathamaññattha honti asambhavāti ekānekesu dvedveti labbhati,
anya-e0806n2:3_8: athavā sarūpena avuttampi sāmatthiyenekānekatthesūti gammamānaṁ vuttameva hotīti katvā‘tecā’tiādikaṁ vuttanti gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:3_9: ekānekesu vattamānato nāmasmāti kimatthaṁ asatvabhūtāya kiriyāyekattādisambandhābhāvā kriyatthāca tyādīhi yevekattādīnaṁ vuttattā tyādyantehi ca na bhaveyyunti payojanantaramāha-‘yampanā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:3_11: Tathāhi saṅkhyākammādayo nāma vāccassa dabbassa dhammo sakattho-pasajjano ca saddo dabbeyeva vattate… dabbeyevānyanayādivohārā,
anya-e0806n2:3_12: tattha dabbavācinā saddena dabbadhammānamabbhantarīkaraṇanti nāyuttametaṁ nāmena pañcannamabhidhānaṁ, vibhattiyo pana jotikā,
anya-e0806n2:5_0: Samavetaṁ vade liṅgaṁ, saṅkhyaṁ kammādikammi ceti.
anya-e0806n2:6_1: tenāti yena pañcako nāmattho adhippeto ekādīsu ca atthesu jo-tanīyesu syādayo vidhiyissanti tena,
anya-e0806n2:6_3: sabhāvatotyādikassāyamadhippāyo ‘‘yadyapi syādayo ekānekesu honti tathāpi ekādayo saṅkhyāya paricchinne atthe vattanti na saṅkhyāmatte,
anya-e0806n2:6_4: saṅkhyāya sambhavābhāvā saṅkhyeye bhavatīti na saṅkhyāpi syādīnamattho’’ti (na) kevalaṁ sakattha dabbādiyeva syādīnamattho na bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:6_6: anena saṅkhyā vibhatyattho catukko nāmatthotyayampakkho nirākato pañcako nāmatthoti dassane saṅkhyākammādīnaṁ vibhattiyo jotikā honti,
anya-e0806n2:6_7: tiko nāmatthoti dassane tu saṅkhyākammādayo vibhattivāccā honti,
anya-e0806n2:6_9: tattha sakattho visesananti sarūpādi yaṁ kiñci visesanattena vattumicchitaṁ taṁ sakattho nāmati attho,
anya-e0806n2:10_0: Bhāvābhāvasabhāvo yo, so guṇo nigguṇo mato.
anya-e0806n2:13_0: Idāni sarūpādino visesanassa sakatthabhāvaṁ jātyādivisesassa dabbabhāvañca dassetuṁ ‘tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:13_2: ettha pana goti jātimattavācini gosadde payutte gosaddo jātimattamāheti so jātiṁ viseseti nāma.
anya-e0806n2:13_3: Yaṭṭhiādisaddehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā upacārato gahitāti yaṭṭhiādidabbehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā purisā visesīyantīti āha-‘dabbampi dabbantarassa visesanabhūtambhavatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:13_4: yaṭṭhiyopavesayāti yaṭṭhisaddavacanīya yaṭṭhidabbavisiṭṭhe purise pavesayāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:13_7: sambandhanimittoti sambandho nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ paccayappavattiyā assa paccayassa soti samāso,
anya-e0806n2:13_8: ettha hi daṇḍo assa atthīti assāti sāmino purisassa saṁsaṅkhātadaṇḍādidabbena sahayo sassāmisambandho, sopi paccayassa nimittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:13_10: (kiri)yā padatthassāpi visesanattena sakatthabhāvo jātipadatthādīnaṁ vutta ṭhāneyeva vattabboti pācakoti ettha kiriyākārakasambandhasaṅkhātaṁ parābhimataṁ sakatthampi paropadesenopadisitukāmo idha sambandhasakatthassa vuttaṭṭhāneyeva kiriyāsakatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘katthaci kiriyāpī’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n2:13_11: Nāmasabhāvena viññāyamānaṁ pañcamaṁ nāmasaṅkhātamatthaṁ dabbapadatthena saṅgahetvā jātiguṇakiriyādabbānīti hi catubbidho nāmattho,
anya-e0806n2:13_12: nāmampi anvattharuḷhivasena duvidhaṁ pumitthinapuṁsaka liṅgavasena tividhampi catubbidhaṁ hoti… yathāvutte catubbidhe atthe namati,
anya-e0806n2:13_13: te vā attani nāmetīti iminā kāraṇena.
anya-e0806n2:13_20: atoti ādesa bhavanato phalaṁ dassitaṁ na siyāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:13_21: vuttiyaṁ ‘evaṁ kumārī kumāriyo’tiādīsu evanti yathā pulliṅge ikārantato syādīnamudāharaṇamanādesatthaṁ vuttaṁ evamitthiyampi anākārantatoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:13_23: asati…pe… vacaneti iminā pāṇiniyānaṁ vibhattisaññāvidhāyakassa suttantarassa atthibhāvaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:13_29: kathampanetesu syādīsu vibhajīyaticcassa vākyatthāssānugamo yenevaṁ vuccaticcāsaṅkiya yena yathā ca vibhajīyati tamupadassento āha-‘tathā hi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:15_0: Vuttiyaṁ kattukiriyāyāti kattusādyatāya taṁ sambandhiniyā kattukammaṭṭhāyapi duvidhāya kiriyāya,
anya-e0806n2:15_1: anekatthattā dhātūnaṁ karoti ettha sambandhanatthoti āha-‘karīyati abhisambandhīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:15_4: sabbakārakānampi pana kiriyāsambandha sabbhāvepi kiriyābhisambandhīyamānatteneva yaṁ vattumicchitaṁ tadeva kammaṁ viññeyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:15_5: kattādi kattu kiriyāyābhisambandhīyamānattepi kattādittavacanicchāyeva kammaṁ na hoti… yasmā vacanicchāyeva kārakāni bhavanti,
anya-e0806n2:15_6: evaṁ sabbakārakānampi kārakantarappattiyaṁ tadabhāvo yathāyogaṁ vattabbo,
anya-e0806n2:15_7: vākyekadesenetyanena ‘‘dvedvekā’’dino vākyassa ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’iccādino ca ekavākyattaṁ sūceti,
anya-e0806n2:15_8: pakaraṇassa mahāvākyarūpattā vippakaṭṭhānipi vākyāni ākaṅkhādisabhāve aññamaññasambandhānubhavanenekavākyabhāvampaṭīpajjante, vuttī hi–
anya-e0806n2:18_2: tena yadyapi tyādinopi dvinnaṁ pūraṇiyā dutiyāti sakkā voharituṁ,
anya-e0806n2:18_3: tathāpi syādīnaṁ dukeyeva dutiyātatiyā ruḷhīti natyādīnaṁ dukāni dutiyādisaddena gayhanti,
anya-e0806n2:18_5: tividhaṁ kammanti sakasamayappasiddhiyā kammassa tividhattamāha, aññe tu sattavidhamicchanti, kathaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:24_0: Satī-satī vā pakati, na yattha pariṇāminī,
anya-e0806n2:26_0: Asantaṁ jāyate yaṁ vā, yaṁ santamappakāsati,
anya-e0806n2:28_0: Ayamettha attho ‘‘kaṭavikārassa kāsasaṅkhātā vijjamānā pakati pariṇāminī kaṭavikārampati pariṇamantī yatthappayoge na nissīyate… kaṭaṁ karotītettha kevalamatthāvagamamattassa vattumicchitattā kāseti asuyyamānattā ca,
anya-e0806n2:28_1: pakatiyā tu suyya mānatte vikāriyaṁ siyā, teneva kāse kaṭaṁ karoti,
anya-e0806n2:28_2: taṇḍule odanaṁ pacatīti dvayattho karoti pacati ca,
anya-e0806n2:28_3: tasmā kāse karoti taṇḍule pacatīti vikārīyati,
anya-e0806n2:28_4: kaṭaṁ karoti odanampacatīti nibbattī yatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:28_5: asatī vā pakati avijjamānattāyeva yattha na nissīyate… (yathā) (potthake) ( ) saṁyogaṁ janayati vibhāgamuppādayatīti saṁyogavibhāgānaṁ kassāpi pakatiyā avikārattā saṁyogavibhāgavante hyavikateheva tesaṁ jananato,
anya-e0806n2:28_6: tamevambhūtamanissitapakatikaṁ avijjamāna (pakati) kaṁ vā kāriyaṁ nibbattikammaṁ nāmāti eko,
anya-e0806n2:28_10: santaṁ vijjamānameva vā kevalamappakāsitapubbaṁ yaṁ uppattiyā abhibyattiyā vā pakāsati, tampi nibbattikammaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:28_12: tadevaṁ kesañci matena anissitapakatikaṁ avijjamānapakatikanti duvidhaṁ nibbattikammampi aññesammatena asantaṁ jāyamānaṁ santamappakāsamānanti duvidhaṁ nibbattikammampītisabbampi aṭṭhitapubbameva jāyatītyasato jānanā na byatiriccaticcāha-‘asato jananaṁ karīyatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:31_0: Kiñci vikāriyaṁ kammaṁ pakatiyā kāraṇassa ucchedena sambhūtaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:31_1: yathā kaṭṭhaṁ bhasmaṁ karotīti kaṭṭhassāccantaparāvatti parāvattiyā (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:31_3: yathā suvaṇṇaṁ kaṭakaṁ keyuraṁ vā karotīti evaṁ dvīdhā sā vikati hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:33_0: Dassanā vānumānā vā, sā pattīti pakittitā.
anya-e0806n2:34_0: Yattha kiriyākato kiriyāsampādito viseso atisayo koci nāvagamyate nappatīyate dassanā vā paccakkhappamāṇena anumānappamāṇena vā yathā nibbattivikatīnamatisayo paccakkhānumānā vagamanīyo,
anya-e0806n2:34_1: tatra hi nibbattiyaṁ visesasiddhiratipasiddhā… atthalābhākhyassa visesassāvijjamānassa kiriyākattā,
anya-e0806n2:34_2: vikāriye ( ) (eva) (potthake) tu kvaci paccakkhavisayo… kaṭṭhaṁ ḍahatīti kaṇhattādibhāvassa paccakkhenevopalabbhanato,
anya-e0806n2:34_3: kvacidanumānagammo… devadattaṁ roseti pasādayati veti visiṭṭhamukhavaṇṇādikāriyānumeyyattā rosādino,
anya-e0806n2:34_4: evaṁ yattha na visesasiddhi api tu pattimattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:34_7: kathañcarahi asantassa santassa (potthake) pattikammassa kiñci (akaronta)ssa kārakattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:34_8: na hi kiñci akarontaṁ kārakambhavitumarahatīti uccate-
anya-e0806n2:37_0: Atra daṭṭhuṁ sakkā iti dassane khamatā ābhāsopagamo visayattopagamo visayattopagamanaṁ byatti ceti evamādayo visesā yathāyogaṁ pattikammassa kiriyānipphattiyaṁ icchitā,
anya-e0806n2:37_2: ādiccaṁ passatīti ettha hi ādicco daṭṭhuṁ sakkā,
anya-e0806n2:37_3: tatova so dissati abhibyattiñcopayātīti dassanakiriyānipphādakatthenāssa kārakattamupapajjate,
anya-e0806n2:37_5: nanu vikāriyampi nibbattikammameva… tena rūpenāsatoyeva jananato,
anya-e0806n2:37_6: pattikammampi kiriyāsambandharūpenāsantameva pacchā tathā bhavatīti nibbattiyevāti saccaṁ-
anya-e0806n2:40_0: Visesānupādānatoti ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ti sāmaññena vuttattā vuttaṁ. Karīyati kaṭo,
anya-e0806n2:40_1: kato kaṭo ccevamādīsu tyādippabhutīhi atihitakammādinissayesupi ekattādīsu dutiyādayo papponti niyamābhāvā,
anya-e0806n2:40_2: tathāhi pañcake nāmatthe kaṭādivacanīyassa sambandhī kammādyattho,
anya-e0806n2:40_3: tyādippabhutīti anabhi hitassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassābhidhānāya abhihitesupi kaṭādīsu kammādīsu dutiyādayo siyunti pāṇiniyā ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ccādīsu (2-3-2) ‘‘anabhihite’’ti (2-3-1) vacanamadhikaronti,
anya-e0806n2:40_4: veyyattiyāyeva dutiyādīnappasaṅgepi tannissayabhūte-kattādyatthe jotanāyābhihitesu dutiyādayo siyuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:40_7: tathāpyekattādayo nābhihitāti tassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassāti dhānāya abhihitesupi kammādīsu dutiyādayo siyunti pāṇiniyā ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ti ‘‘anabhihite’’ti vacanamadhikaronti,
anya-e0806n2:40_9: tatra tasmiṁ dutiyādi vibhattividhāne idaṁ codyaṁ siyā, kinti āha-‘pañcake’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:40_10: anabhihitakammādinissayesuti anabhihitā kammādayo nissayā yesamekattādīnaṁ, tesūtyattho,
anya-e0806n2:40_11: dutiyādayo vibhattiyo yathā siyunti jotanāyābhidhānāya cāti yujjamānavasena attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:40_14: pañcake tike cā bhihitakammādinissaye sekattādīsu dutiyādippattimāsaṅkāvasena dassetvā catukkavādīnampi pakkhamubbhāviya pariharituṁ ‘yadiccā’dimāha,
anya-e0806n2:40_15: ayantesamadhippāyo ‘‘yadesā saṅkhyā pāṭipadikattho tappaṭipajjane kammādayo vibhattivacanīyā,
anya-e0806n2:40_16: tadā ‘anabhihite kamme’tiādinā anabhihitaggahaṇaṁ kammādivisesānamanubhavantamanatthakaṁ… abhihite vibhattivāccābhāvato,
anya-e0806n2:40_17: yadā panāyaṁ pakkho ‘saṅkhyā vibhattivacanīyā’ti tadā ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ tyevamādayo niddesā visayasandassanamattāyeva veditabbā’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:40_19: saddatthābyatirittatthamattoyevāti byatireko byatirittaṁ, napuṁsake bhāve kto,
anya-e0806n2:40_20: na vijjate byatirittaṁ byatireko bhedo yassa taṁ abyatirittaṁ, abyatibhinnanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:40_21: saddatthato sakatthato abyatirittaṁ atthamattaṁ atthasāmaññaṁ yassa odanādisaddassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n2:41_1: tathāpi tehi abhihitepyevameva daṭṭhabbanti nidassento āha-‘eva’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:41_2: kara-karaṇe karīyitthāti kato‘kto bhāvakammesu’ti (5-56) kamme kto,
anya-e0806n2:41_3: satikoti ettha kītoti kammatthe ‘‘dissantaññepi paccayā’’ti (4-120) iko,
anya-e0806n2:41_5: evañca dhuhi kimekamudāharaṇaṁ dattamācariyene tyato āha- ‘udāharaṇa’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:41_6: anabhihiteti vacanaṁ vināpīti vacanaṁ vinā evāti avadhāraṇe-apisaddo, sambhāvanevā,
anya-e0806n2:41_9: evañca panettha dutiyādīnamabhihite pasaṅgābhāvo jānitabbo ‘‘paccate odano,
anya-e0806n2:41_10: kato kaṭoccādopi yadi dutiyādayo siyuṁ paṭhamāvidhānassāvakāso na bhaveyya tato sāmatthiyānabhihiteyeva kammādo dutiyādayo sakiriyā (yaṁ tada)bhibyattiyā bhavissanti, paṭhamevatvabhihite’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:41_11: na nuca paṭhamāyākārakamavakāso rukkho pilakkhoti rukkho pilakkhoti kriyāpadaṁ na sūyateti vibhatyantarassappatti maññatebhassāpadīpa kimidamuccate akārakanti yadya kārakaṁ nedampayogamarahati tato yattha visesakiriyāna massavanaṁ tattha padatthasahacaritāya sattāya patītiyā ‘rukkho atthi pilakkho atthī’ti apekkhīyatīti kārakattaṁ rukkhādīna mattheveti attheveti ññataṁ vatthuṁ paraṁ patipādayituṁ saddo payujjate ññaṇañca satoiti yatra kriyāpadantarassa appayogo tatra ussaggato sattā patītitutthīti kriyāpadānusaṅgara kattari tatiyappasaṅgaranavakāsā paṭhamā tyattho-bhassapadīpa,
anya-e0806n2:41_12: na ca uccaṁ nīcaṁtyadhikaraṇavācitte vācikā nipātassa atthītyanena natthi sambandhoti uccamatthītyādheyyasseva kattuttaṁ nādhārassātya kārakattamādhārassātyavakāso-tthi paṭhamāyāti ‘‘paṭhamāvidhā nassāvakāso na bhaveyyā’’ti yathāvutto-yaṁ hetu asiddhoti ca sakkā vattuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_0: Yañcāti casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye aparampi kiñci vattabbamatthīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_2: yadetthāna bhihitādhikāro natthi tadā yathā ‘kato kaṭo’ccatrattena kammassābhihitattā dutiyā na hoti tathā ‘kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīya’nti kaṭasaddato uppannāya dutiyāya (vipulādigatassa) kammassā bhihitattā vipulādīhi visesanehi dutiyā na siyā,
anya-e0806n2:42_3: tato tyādi tabbādiṇādisamāsehi kammassāna bhihitattamattevāti vipulādīhipi dutiyāvidhānasaṅkhātaṁ anabhihite’’ti (2-3-1) anabhihita vacanassa adhikāre yañca phalaṁ cintayatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_5: paccekaṁ karotyabhisambandhatāyāti ‘kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ karoti dassanīyaṁ karoti’ccevaṁ paccekaṁ paccekaṁ karotissābhisambandhatāyāti attho, kammatā atthīti seso,
anya-e0806n2:42_6: evaṁ maññate-‘‘kaṭaṁ karomīti pavatto vipulaṁ karomī dassaniyaṁ karomīti ca pavattovāti vipulādīnampi paccekaṁ kammatā attheva,
anya-e0806n2:42_7: tatthekassābhidhāne parekassa sukhamavalokayantīti tadabhidhānāyapi dutiyā bhavissatī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:42_8: pakārantarāvatāro nācariye noparodhitoti tampi panettha dassayissāma-‘‘kaṭasaddā uppajjamānā dutiyā kaṭajāti kammamabhihitavatī, na vipulādiguṇakammaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_9: tato tadabhidhānāya ca dutiyāyeva bhavati, athavā kaṭova kammaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_11: kaṭaṁ karoti vipulo dassanīyoti hi vuccamāne vipulādayo kattusamānādhikaraṇatāyeva patīyeyyuṁ tasmā kaṭasaddasāmānādhikaraṇyampaṭipādayatā vassamettha dutiyā karaṇīyā’’ti. Nanvemiccādicodyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_13: pappotīti kaṭa kamme-bhidhāniye (kato) ti ktappaccayassa katattā udārādito karotyabhisambandhā dutiyā pappotīti attho, evaṁ maññateccādi parihāro,
anya-e0806n2:42_14: avayavena kammaṁ na vadatīti sambandho, avayavenāti visuṁvisuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:42_16: Hotu kāmaṁ udārāditopi vuttena vidhinā paṭhamā,
anya-e0806n2:42_18: antobhūto antogadho nāmassa saddassa attho yasmiṁ kammalakkhaṇattheso attho kammalakkhaṇo abhihito kathito sampanno sampajjatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:42_19: nanu ‘kato kaṭo’ccādo sabhāvato sabbakammavuttiyā antobhūtanāmatthavuttiyā cātthamatte hoti sabbattha paṭhamāti ‘kaṭaṁ karoti uḷāraṁ sobhanaṁ dassanīya’nti kaṭāditopi uppannāya dutiyāya kammassābhihitattā uḷārādīhi paṭhamāppasaṅgo siyāti abhihitābhidhānappasaṅgopagataṁ codanaṁ manasi nidhāyāha-‘kaṭādisaddo tvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:43_0: ‘‘Katturicchitatama’’ntyanena (1-4-49) kattuno kiriyāya sambandhi tumiṭṭhatamaṁ tasmiṁ icchitatame kammasaññaṁ vidhāya nibbatyādikesutīsu kammesu dutiyā vidhīyate pāṇinīyehi,
anya-e0806n2:43_2: odanaṁ pacati gāvumpayo dohatityādo(hi) odanādyatthā pacanādikiriyārabbhateti odanapayādīnamicchitatamattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:43_5: puna payādinipphattinimittaṁ yaṁkiñci dohanādikiriyā yuttaṁ karaṇādirūpena akathitaṁ gavādikamicchitaṁ kārakaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:43_6: tatthāpi ‘‘akathitañcā’’ti (1-4-51) kammasaññaṁ vidhāya teneva dutiyā vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n2:46_0: Upayujjate iṭṭhatthasiddhiyaṁ byāpārīyatītyupayogo-payoppabhuti, tasmiṁ, nimittaṁ gavādi,
anya-e0806n2:46_5: guṇasaddenettha padhānasādhanaṁ dhammādikaṁ vattumicchitaṁ padhānasādhanañhi kiriyāyopakārakamupakāriyaṁ padhānabhūtaṁ kiriyamapekkhiya guṇo bhavati, co-nuttasamuccaye,
anya-e0806n2:46_7: upayujjamānañca taṁ payopabhuticeti visesanasamāsaṁ katvā upayujjamānapayoppabhutino nimittanti chaṭṭhīsamāso,
anya-e0806n2:46_8: pabhuti saddena gavādino gahaṇaṁ, ādisaddena gomantādino,
anya-e0806n2:46_9: dutiyenādi saddena adhikaraṇādino, catutthena vinayādino, vidhānanti dutiyā vidhānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:46_11: Pāṇiniyehi ‘‘tathā yuttañcānicchitaṁ’’ (1-4-50) iccanena kammasaññaṁ vidhāya ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ (2-3-2) tyaneneva dutiyā vidhīyate, tandassetumāha-‘yene’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:49_1: tatoyeva‘gāmaṁ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappatī’tyatra nevicchitanānicchitassapi rukkhamūlassa kamma saññā siddhāti tattha ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ti dutiyā vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n2:49_5: rukkhamūlopasappanantu pasaṅgāgatanti rukkhamūlānampi kiriyābhisambandho attheva, atrāpi-
anya-e0806n2:52_2: ādisaddena ‘pattheti gāvuṁ purisaṁ dvijo’tyādayo saṅgahitā, nayatinī=pāpuṇane, vahati vaha=pāpuṇane, harati hara=haraṇe, jayatiji=jaye,
anya-e0806n2:52_5: atha ‘‘adhisīṭṭhāsānaṁ kammaṁ’’tyādinā (1-4-46) tena tena kammasaññaṁ vidhāya ‘paṭhaviṁ adhisessatī’ti ādo (tattha) tattha ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ti (2-3-2) dutiyā vidhīyate tehi tehi sattha kārehi,
anya-e0806n2:52_6: sabbatthevettha lokassa kammavacanicchāti kamenetaṁññasaññāpubbakaṁ kammamupadassento āha-‘adhipubba’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:52_7: yāya vatticchāya dutiyā siyā tāya vatticchāya kammatā kathaṁhināmāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:52_10: tatthevaṁ kiṁ bhavato manasi dosadhijambhanenāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:52_11: dhammeti etthāpi evaṁ saddaṁ yojetvā attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:52_16: evaṁsaddasamānatthattā tathā saddassa tadatthānusāreneva viññāyatīti tathāsaddassa attho visuṁ na vutto, pānañca ācāroca pānācāraṁ,
anya-e0806n2:52_18: pānatthācāratthadhātusambandhī yo nadyādi ko ādhāro so pānācāravāyevāti āha- ‘pānatthācāratthānaṁ dhātūnamādhāre’ti ,
anya-e0806n2:52_21: patiparīhi bhāgecetyavasiddhāti iminā patisaddassa dhātunā ayuttataṁ dasseti… yadi yujjeyya chaṭṭhiyābhāvā, tenāha-‘yadātvi’ccādi, vuttiyaṁ tenāti tasaddena,
anya-e0806n2:54_0: Yadā kāladdhānamiccādinā‘māsamāsate kosaṁ sayati’ccādo akammakehipi yoge kālabhāvaddhadesānaṁ parehi kammattamanuññātanti ca,
anya-e0806n2:54_1: yadātviccādinā tu kiriyāva sabbenasabbaṁ na sūyati,
anya-e0806n2:54_2: tathā sati kuto ca kammattanti teheva vuttantī ca dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:54_3: gamma mānakiriyāyogopi na nissito… māsamāsateccādīsu āsanādi āsanādīsu (potthake) kiriyānaṁ māsādiyogo viya kalyāṇittaguṇādiyogo ca lokassa patītipathamupayātīti,
anya-e0806n2:54_4: na sijjhatīti kiriyā na honti guṇadabbānīti kiriyāsambandhābhāvā kammattābhāvoti na sijjhati,
anya-e0806n2:54_6: Ajjhayanakiriyāya pabbatena ca māsakosānaṁ sākallena sambandhābhāvā accantasaṁyogābhāvoti māsassātiādīsu na dutiyā.
anya-e0806n2:54_7: Pubbaṇhe samayanti iminā pubbaṇhe samayoti sattamīāmādisamāsaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:54_8: accanta mevāti iminā samayassa sākallena viharaṇakiriyāya sambandhamāha,
anya-e0806n2:54_9: yaṁsamayaṁ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi, taṁ ekaṁsamayanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:54_10: upasaṅkamanakiriyāyaccantameva yuttoti iminā nivāsanaviharaṇa kiriyāhipi pubbaṇhasamayādīnamaccantameva yuttataṁ upalakkheti,
anya-e0806n2:54_13: idha pana sattami yampattāyaṁ sattamyatthe bāhulakena ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’cceva dutiyāppatti.
anya-e0806n2:55_2: tathāpīti vuttakkamena karaṇattasambhavā tatiyāya vijjamānāyapi, siyāti tatiyā siyā, tañcāti taṁ karaṇañca.
anya-e0806n2:55_3: Kārakamajjheti ettha chaṭṭhī samāso kārakasaddena ca sattikārakaṁ gahitanti (āha) ‘dvinnaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe’ti,
anya-e0806n2:55_4: abhinnassāpi hi ekassa devadattādikattuno bhinnānaṁ taṁsamavetānaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe kāladdhānāni,
anya-e0806n2:55_7: dvinnaṁ ahānaṁ samāhāro dvīhaṁ tasmiṁ. Isumasatīti vā,
anya-e0806n2:55_8: isumhi āso asseti vā nipphannena issāsasaddena gammamānaṁ kiriyaṁ dasseti ‘isvasane’ti, nanviccādi codyaṁ, dhanupañcasataṁ koso, evamaññateccādi parihāro,
anya-e0806n2:55_10: muttasaṁsayenedaṁ samānanti mutto saṁsayo yasmiṁ avadhyādo tenetaṁ tulyanti attho.
anya-e0806n2:55_11: Vuttiyaṁ abhimatāti ‘‘sattamī pañcamiyo kārakamajjhe’’ti (2-3-7) vacanena sattamīpañcamiyo papañcattamabhimatā,
anya-e0806n2:55_12: dvīhe bhuñjissatīti dvīsu divasesu gatesu bhuñjissatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:55_14: sakasakakārakavacanicchāyevāti hi idaṁ bāhullaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:55_15: dvīhā bhuñjissati kosā vijjhatīti dvīhā nikkhamma bhuñjissati,
anya-e0806n2:55_16: kosā nikkhamma ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhati upāttavisayo-yamavadhi,
anya-e0806n2:55_17: kose vijjhatīti kose ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n2:57_0: Katacatthasamāsāti kato catthasamāso yesu te tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n2:57_2: cattasamāse gatyādīnaṁ visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā tehi paraṁ payujjamāno atthasaddo gatyādīhi paccekamabhisambajjhatīti maññate,
anya-e0806n2:57_3: atha sutte ‘payojje’iccetāvatyuccamāne payojjo sayaṁ kattāti kathaṁ viññāyati yena ‘payojje kattarī’ti vivaraṇaṁ katamiccāsaṅkiyāha-‘gatyādyattha’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:57_5: takkiriyāsamatthovāti tassā gatyādikāya kiriyāya samattho eva niyujjateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:57_6: kiriyākaraṇe samattho nāma kattāvāti āha-‘soca kattā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:57_7: Dutiyāya siddhāyāti vakkhamānanayena payojjassa kattuno kammattasiddhiyā ‘‘kamme dutiyā’’ti sutteneva kamme dutiyāya siddhāya.
anya-e0806n2:57_10: payojjo kattā na kammaṁ tyabbhupagamma payojje kattarī’ti vivaritanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:57_13: niyujjamāno payojakabyāpārasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamānattā kammabhūtova bhavatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:57_15: tathāpi so payojakena gamanādīsu byāpāriyamāno payojakassa byāpāralakkhaṇāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamāno yadi kammaṁ na hoti aññathā kiṁ hotīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena sāmatthiyena kammabhūtova hotī’’ti (attho) (potthake) ( ),
anya-e0806n2:57_21: nanu vacanappayojanaṁ dassayatā vacanamevopadassiya pañho kātabbo,
anya-e0806n2:57_23: heṭṭhā vuttakkamena niyamatthattā vacanassa evakāro labbhati,
anya-e0806n2:57_24: sambandhivacanattā etasaddassa tena yathāpaṭhitā gatyādayova visessabhūtā saṅkhepena parāmasīyantīti ete samevāti katanti maññate evosañcāti maññate (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:57_25: (gacchati devadattoti…pe… nahotīti) iminā imamatthañca joteti ‘‘yadipi kiriyābhisambandhā payojjassa viya kattunopi kammattampasajjati,
anya-e0806n2:57_26: tathāpi payojjeti vuttattā kattari devadatte dutiyā nappasajjatī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:57_27: abhimatāti ‘‘gatibuddhyā’’di (1-4-52) suttena payojjassa kattuno kammasaññaṁ vidhāya tasmiṁ payojjedutiyābhimatā, carahisaddo pucchāyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:57_28: payojetīti asmiṁ uddese tadā kathaṁ bhavitabbanti sesoti yadācarahiccādivākyassāvasāne payojetīti asmiṁ uddese vacanasamīpe’tadā kathambhavitabba’nti pāṭhaseso hotīti attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:57_29: yāvatāti tatiyantapaṭīrūpako nipāto, yasmā dattho vattate,
anya-e0806n2:57_30: yasmā dutiyā pappoti tasmā ‘yaññadattene’ti bhavitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:59_1: sāpi tatiyāpi dutiyāpiti vattabba yadātviccādinā harati nāhāratthe naharatyatthe (potthake) tipi viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:59_2: ubhayatthāti dutiyāya pattāya appattāya ca, vibhāsā vikappoti attho, kāretikara-karaṇe,
anya-e0806n2:59_4: abhivadanamabhivādo taṁ karotīti ‘‘dhātvatthenāmasmī’’ti (5-12) imhi nāmadhātu ‘abhivādi’tisutte niddiṭṭhoti āha-‘abhivādismā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n2:62_0: ‘‘Vahissāniyantuke’’ti gaṇasutte ayamettho ‘‘vahissadhātussa payojje kattari niyanturahite dutiyā na bhavatī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:62_1: niyantā sārathi kiriyāsiddhiṁ niyāmakoti vatvā tameva pakāsetumāha-‘kiriyaṅga’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:62_3: niyametvāti ekasmiṁ karaṇīye kiriyā visaye patiṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0806n2:62_4: vāhayati bhāraṁ devadattenetyatra hi devadatto paññavā puriso niyantāramantareneva bhāraṁ vahatītyaniyantuko kattā,
anya-e0806n2:62_5: vāhayati bhāraṁ balībadde iccatra tu balībaddā niyantā ramantarena na vahantīti saniyantukā.
anya-e0806n2:63_0: ‘‘Bhikkhissāhiṁsāya’’nti gaṇasuttassāyamattho ‘‘bhakkhissāhiṁsatthassa payojje kattari dutiyā na bhavatī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:63_1: atha kathamettha hiṁsatthatā bhakkhissa hiṁsā hi cetanāvati sambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:63_2: na cetthasassaṁ cetanāvantanti āha-‘sabbe’iccādi, sabbeti rukkhādayo, bhāvā padatthā,
anya-e0806n2:63_5: tathā sati sammatameve-ttho-padassetvā gantabbaṁ kinnāmāññadassanopagātādhirenāti tuṇhī hoti nikkāraṇissā nikkammissā (potthake) bhavato-pāyoti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n2:63_6: paratthānubaddhakicchaṁ pana mahāpuññapaññā na kiñci viya maññanti,
anya-e0806n2:63_8: taṁtaṁ mataññuno vā kadāci karahaci yadidamavalokeyyuṁ te cetthāvatāraṁ cetthakāraṁ (potthake) labheyyuṁ etādiso ca paññavā paṭiladdhabuddhavacanappasādo’ti tadavatārena ca buddhe bhagavati kamena daḷhaṁ pasādaṁ paṭilabheyyu’’nti,
anya-e0806n2:63_9: evamevaṁ tattha tattha taṁtaṁbyākaraṇodāharaṇappasaṅgepi tadanusāreneva tantaṁpayojanaṁ veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:64_0: Duhādīnaṁ tyevamādo amhākamparamagurunā ratanamatipañcikālaṅkārādikārena nānākārasāratthavedaveditu vedāvedita (potthake) mahāpaññāpāṭavānaṁ paññavantānaṁ sāminā mahāsāminā sambuddhasāsanaratanavaropakārakena ‘idamettha vicāraṇīyaṁ’tyabhidhāya nānāmatantaramākaḍḍhiya bahuṁ sampaveditamatthi,
anya-e0806n2:64_2: Satyapyanekadassanabhede siṭṭhappayogānusārena yattha padhānekammanityādippabhutayodissanti, yatra tvappadhānetyādī, yatrobhayatrapi,
anya-e0806n2:64_6: tena kammadvayayuttānaṁ majjhe duhādīnamappadhānepi gavādo kamme tyādippabhutayoti yojanā .
anya-e0806n2:64_7: Iccāditiādisaddena ‘avarundhati vajaṁ gāvaṁ avarundhīyate vajaṁ go’iccādīnaṁ pariggaho,
anya-e0806n2:64_9: Gamīyate gāmo devadattanti ettha kathaṁ payojjattasambhavoti āha-‘purise’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:64_10: yajjapi gāmo tuṇhī hoti nibyāpārattā purisova tu gamanakiriyaṁ nipphādeti,
anya-e0806n2:64_12: tamubhinnampi gāmapurisānaṁ samānanti purisa kiriyātulyaphalattā gāmopi gamanakiriyāya kattubyapadese kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:64_13: tathāhi gāmaṁ gacchanto koci gāme āsanne sati vadati ‘āgato gāmo patto gāmo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:64_14: atoññesanti ye kammadvayayuttā duhādayo gamanādyatthācodāhaṭā, etehi aññesaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:65_0: ‘‘Duhi yāci rudhi pucchi, bhikkhi ci bruvi sāsi ca;
anya-e0806n2:66_0: Ji daṇḍi patthi manthī ca, dhātū honti duhādayo.
anya-e0806n2:72_0: Payogo pana sambandhacintāyamiha ca vuttānusārena sabbathā viññeyyā.
anya-e0806n2:74_0: Pubbe kiriyānissayena kārakanissayena (potthake) dutiyāya vihitattā āha ‘idāni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:74_1: dhisaddassa atthappadhāna niddesena vā ādisaddena vā ‘hā devadatta’ntipi hoti,
anya-e0806n2:74_2: hā devadattadukkhanti tu dukkhena yogā devadattena na yutto hotīti paṭhamāvāmantaṇe.
anya-e0806n2:74_3: Nanuca antarāsaddena yoge yathārājagahanālandāhi dutiyā (tathā) antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nā landa(nti tathā) antarāmaggeti ettha maggatopi antarāmaggatopi kasmā na dutiyāti tenāyogā,
anya-e0806n2:74_4: yesañhi taṁmajjhaṁ te tena yujjantīti tehiyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:74_5: athavābbhupagatepi taṁyoge taṁsambandhīyeva maggoti mukhyattā tato sabbassa (potthake) na dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:74_6: atrāpi chaṭṭhīyeva pappoti antarā tañca mañca kamaṇḍaluiti,
anya-e0806n2:74_8: atha kamaṇḍalusaddato dutiyā kasmā na bhavati satīpyantarena yoge tassa padhānattā,
anya-e0806n2:74_11: tatra kamaṇḍaluno sakatthe vattamānattā padhānattenāvatattā pāṭipadikato accutattā parattā paṭhameva bhavatīti jīnindabuddhinyāsa.
anya-e0806n2:74_12: Nindādi lakkhaṇassa sambandhassa sabbhāvā sabbattha sambandhachaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṁ vacanaṁ, ākatigaṇo-yaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:76_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesuti nāmassā kassā (potthake) yamatthaniddesoti āha ‘abhināyo yutto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:76_2: lakkhaṇasaddena hetu vattumicchitoti āha-‘tatthe’ccādi, duvidho hetu,
anya-e0806n2:76_5: samupalakkhayatīti samupalakkhaṇaṁ, saṅketamattaṁ ñāpakaṁ, na tu janakaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:76_7: janakassāpyatra lakkhaṇattena gahaṇe payojanaṁ ‘‘anunā’’ (2-10) iccatra daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:76_8: Kañcipakāranti iminā itthaṁsaddassa atthaṁ vadati. Pattoti iminā bhūtasaddassa,
anya-e0806n2:76_10: rukkholakkhaṇanti rukkho ñāpakahetūti attho… rukkhena vijjuyā ñāpīyamānattā,
anya-e0806n2:76_11: ācariyajinindabuddhi pana aññathā vaṇṇayati, tassedaṁ mataṁ-
anya-e0806n2:77_0: Kriyāya jotako nāyaṁ, sambandhassa na vācako;
anya-e0806n2:79_0: Ayamettha attho ‘‘ayamabhi abhinandatityādīsu viya kiriyāya jotako na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:79_1: chaṭṭhī viya sambandhassa vācako na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:79_2: nikkosambītyatra gamanakiriyāpekkhī nisaddo viya nāpi kiriyantarā pekkhī,
anya-e0806n2:79_3: kiñcarahi sambandhassa tu bhedako visesako bhavatī’’ti tamupadassetumāha-‘aññe tvi’ccādi, ettha itisaddo nidassane,
anya-e0806n2:79_4: rukkhampatvā vijjotate itievaṁ pattikiriyāya patvātivuttarukkhapāpanakiriyāya janitoti attho,
anya-e0806n2:79_5: tathāhi rukkhassa vijjuyā pāpanābhāve vijjuyā lakkhiyāya tallaṇassa ca rukkhassa yo lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvo sambandho, so kena sampādito bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n2:79_6: nanu sambandhe abhinā jotīyamāne rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā kathaṁ jotīyatīti āha-‘lakkhaṇatthoca visayabhāvenā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:79_11: devadattassa sādhuttasaṅkhātaitthampakārappattiyā visayabhāvenāvaṭṭhitā mātā tattha vattati nāmāti āha-‘mātuyā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:79_12: mātā ca itthambhūte pavattā visaya bhāvena devadatto ca tattha visayībhāvena,
anya-e0806n2:79_13: tesañca visayavisayībhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya jāto,
anya-e0806n2:79_15: socātinā jotīyatīti mātu tenābhinā yogoti āha-‘yvāya’ccādi, mātusambandhoiti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:79_17: evaṁ maññate ‘‘kiñcāpi so sambandho devadattenāpyavinābhāvīti tassa sobhinā jotīyate,
anya-e0806n2:79_18: tathāpi mātusambandhobhinā jotīyatīti ‘mātu tena yogo’ti ca (vuccati)… saddasattiyā taggatāyeva dutiyāya ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotanato’’ti rukkho rukkho tiṭṭhatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:79_19: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti ṭhitinnissāya esaṁ rukkhānaṁ yo ca sambandhoti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:79_20: rukkhānanti iminā rukkhā kiriyāya pare sambandhinoti ñāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:79_21: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti iminā pana tiṭṭhatisaddavacanīyā sādhyarūpā ṭhitikiriyā rukkhato pare sambandhīti,
anya-e0806n2:79_22: acetanānaṁ rukkhānamapekkhāvirahepi lokampatītivasena ‘pipatīsā’dīnaṁ viññāyamānattā viññāyamānaṭhānāpekkhaṇakiriyāyasādhyasādhanalakkhaṇo sambandho jātoti viññeyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:79_24: dvibbacaneneva jotanīyāti vicchātthe vuttimatte satīpi vibhattiyā vicchatthe vutkimattetyādivacanaṁ vicāreretabbaṁvitattiyā abisaddassaca vicchatthe vuttiyā abhāvā,
anya-e0806n2:79_25: lakkhaṇitthambhūti hi pakativisesanaṁ jotetumasamatthattā vicchāya jotanāya dvibbavacanaṁ kattabbamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n2:81_0: Upādiyamānoti abbhupagammamāno, yadi pana upādiyamāno bhāgo,
anya-e0806n2:83_0: Natulakkhaṇanti saccakiriyā vuṭṭhiyā hetu hoti, na tu saṅketoti attho,
anya-e0806n2:83_1: hetuttā lakkhaṇattābhāve saccakiriyāya kathaṁ lakkhaṇe dutiyāti hetuttepi lakkhaṇattamassa sādhento sādhammapayogenānvayamāha-‘yaṁ sakimpi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:83_2: ettha hi lakkhaṇaṁ sacca kiriyāti paṭiññā,
anya-e0806n2:83_4: yaṁ sakimpi nimittatāya kappate tampi lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:83_5: yathā’api bhavaṁ kamaṇḍalupāṇiṁ sissamaddakkhī’ti sādhammapayogenānvayo daṭṭhabbo, kappateti samatthoti attho,
anya-e0806n2:83_6: kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi asseti kamaṇḍalupāṇī, apīti pañhe,
anya-e0806n2:83_7: kadāci kenaci kamaṇḍalupāṇīsisso diṭṭho so tameva dassanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ katvā pucchati ‘api’tyādinā,
anya-e0806n2:83_8: atha yathā vuttena hetunopi lakkhaṇattamattu tathāpi paravippaṭisedhena hetumhi tatiyā kasmā na siyāti codayamāha ‘na nvevampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:83_10: tathāhi chaṭṭhiyā pavādo hoti hetumhi tatiyāvidhi… sambandhachaṭṭhiyā pattāya hetutatiyāvidhānato upapadavibhattividhipi chaṭṭhiyāpavādo… sambandhavisesābhibyattihetunopapadena yoge tasmiṁyeva sambandhe vidhānato,
anya-e0806n2:83_13: saccakiriyamanu pāvassīti tu hetumhi lakkhaṇe-pavādavippaṭisedhe sati pubbavippaṭisedhena dutiyā bhavati.
anya-e0806n2:85_0: Sahatthe-nuno vattane pabbatena yogo kathanti āha‘pabbatene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:87_2: kathaṁ tena yuttattaṁ ukkaṭṭhassāti hīnukkaṭṭhasambandhamukhena vibhāvento’tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:87_6: so sāriputtādiko ukkaṭṭho) hīnatthavisayo jāyate… tabbisaye tassa ukkaṭṭhatā pattito,
anya-e0806n2:87_7: hīnukkaṭṭhasambandho pana atisāyanādikāya kāyaci kiriyāya katoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:89_2: athādhikīvinimutte adhikādhikisambandho kathamavasīyate nahyatrādhikī koci sūyaticcāha-‘navine’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:89_5: Dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa adhikassāpyupasaddena yogā tatopi kasmā na sattamītyāha-‘adhikamhātvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:89_6: yathā ekāyeva vibhattiyā ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotitattā vijjusaṅkhātalakkhiyā sattamyabhāvo,
anya-e0806n2:89_7: evamidhā pīti pubbe vuttasamādhimatidisanto āha-‘lakkhitā viya sattamya bhāvo’ti, ‘‘māṇikā caturodoṇā, khāritthī catumāṇikā’’.
anya-e0806n2:91_5: diṭṭhanto-panītottho sukhena paṭipattuṁ sakkāti pasiddhamanuvadiyamānamappasiddhañca vidhīyamānaṁ diṭṭhantamāha-‘yathā yo kuṇḍalī so devadatto’ti, kuṇḍalittampasiddhaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:91_9: tathā sambandhābhibyañjanakenādhinā yogepi visesanatova bhavati, nāññatoti āha-‘tatthā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n2:91_10: Byatirekamāpādīyatīti kārakachakkato byatirittattā sambandho byatireko taṁ āpādīyati pāpīyatīti attho, ubhayatoti saṁto sāmito ca,
anya-e0806n2:91_11: adhibrahmadatte pañcālāti brahmadattassa pañcālā santakā sāmino (potthake) ti attho,
anya-e0806n2:91_12: santakā sāmino (potthake) hi pañcālā, na sāmi nasaṁ (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:93_2: pacatyodanaṁ devadattoccādo kamme patiṭṭhitaṁ kiriyaṁ karotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:93_3: karotīti ca iminā anvattha byapadesova siddho-yaṁ kattu vohāroti ñāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:93_4: kenaci payujjamānopi sake kamme sayameva padhānattamanubhavatīti‘payutto vā padhānabhāvenā’ti vuttaṁ hoti cettha-
anya-e0806n2:94_0: Padhānatāya yo kattu, kammaṭṭhaṁ kurute kriyaṁ;
anya-e0806n2:95_0: Sā kattā nāmappayutto, payutto vātyayaṁ dvidhāti.
anya-e0806n2:96_2: nanu kiriyā-yamabyavadhānena karaṇādhikaraṇe heva sādhyate kattārā tu dūraṭṭhena,
anya-e0806n2:96_3: tathāsati kathamanekasādhanasādhanīyaṁ kiriyaṁ kattāva karoti mukhyabhāvenāparetvamukhyabhāvenāti vuccate-
anya-e0806n2:97_2: pavivekeca kārakantharāmabhāvedissabhe kattarikriyā atthi bhavati vijjaticcādo titaṭīkā, tatiyapāthānaṁpāta 100, naṁpāta 243;
anya-e0806n2:99_0: Ayamettha attho ‘‘kattuno sakāsā aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ ubbhūtyā sambhavenaca,
anya-e0806n2:99_1: tathāhi pasiddhakaraṇasabhāvopi pharasu kattāyattavuttitāyādhikaraṇambha vati‘pharasumhi ṭhapetvā chindatī’ti,
anya-e0806n2:99_3: kattuno kiriyāya ālocanena dassanena ca ‘devadatto atthi bhavati vijjatī’ti vuthabbhūtassānena ālocanena dassanenaca kattunodevadattenadevadattaṁ bhavati vijjatīti (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:99_5: iminā kāraṇena dūrato upakārittepi kattuyeva sappadhānatā siyā’’ti, punapi-
anya-e0806n2:102_1: kasmāti ce yato kāraṇā atthe attano abhidheyyesaddassa vutti paṭipatti anādinā micchābhyāsenabhavati tasmā thālyādīnantiādi pakataṁ,
anya-e0806n2:102_2: kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘aññathā saddattho, aññathā sabhāvattho,
anya-e0806n2:102_3: na hi saddo bāhye vatthumhi byāpāramāpajjati, tathāhi–
anya-e0806n2:103_0: Aññathe vāggi saṁsaggā, dāhaṁ daḍḍhoti maññati;
anya-e0806n2:105_0: Bāhyapadatthassa sabhāvo viya hutvā micchābhyāsena anādinā pana pavattena bāhye vatthūni avijjamānena karaṇabhūtena thālyādīnaṁ kattuttaṁ hotī’’ti. Atha ca pana–
anya-e0806n2:110_1: saddāvāti sadde tedhammā hontu vā mā vā kattusambandhiyathāvuttadhammavacanicchāya saddatova kattā patīyate,
anya-e0806n2:110_5: atoyevāccantamasantopi aṅkuro jananakiriyāya kattā bhavati ‘aṅkuro jāyate’ti, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n2:114_0: Kintaṁ karaṇaṁ nāmāti āha-‘yo panā’tiādi, yoti yo padattho,
anya-e0806n2:114_1: iminā idaṁ dīpeti ‘‘karaṇabyapadesāya suttantarābhāvepi karotyaneneti karaṇantyanvatthato pasiddho-yaṁ karaṇavohāro’’ti, atredaṁ paṭibhānaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:117_0: Tattha yaṁvattumicchitaṁtyādinā idaṁ dasseti-‘‘na vatthuto kiñci karaṇaṁ nāma atthi,
anya-e0806n2:117_3: pasiddhādhikaraṇānampi tadanuttādivisesasambhave thālyā pacatī’ti karaṇattassapi dassanato vacanicchātoyeva karaṇaṁ kārakaṁ viññeyya’’nti,
anya-e0806n2:117_8: Pakati yābhirūpoccādo kiriyāyāvijjamānattā sambandhamattaṁ viññāyatīti sambandhalakkhaṇā chaṭṭhī siyā,
anya-e0806n2:117_9: samena dhāvatītyādo tu kiriyāya vijjamānattepi kammattaṁ vattumicchitanti dutiyā siyā,
anya-e0806n2:117_12: pañcakenāti pañca parimāṇassa pañcako pañcakaṁ vaggaṁ katvā pasavo kiṇāti pañcapañca katvā kiṇātītyatthoti vāttikakārena ‘tatiyā vidhānāyopasaṅkhyānaṁ’kataṁ,
anya-e0806n2:117_19: karotissa gammamānatte pana pakatiyābhirūpo katotiādi, tadā kattariyeva tatiyā,
anya-e0806n2:117_20: yaṁ yasmā aññagotto gotamo na hoti atoca gotamo bhavatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:117_21: nanuca dvidoṇa pañcakā kayampaṭicca kammabhūtā honti dvidoṇādinā keyattā tato kimuccate‘kayampaṭicca dvidoṇapañcakā karaṇāni bhavantī’tyā saṅkīyāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:117_22: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti-‘‘dvidoṇādisaddena hi na gayhupagaṁ vatthumuccati,
anya-e0806n2:117_23: tehi pana dvidoṇādyatthaṁ mūlaṁ tādatthiyā bhihitanti na vuttadosāvasaro’’ti.
anya-e0806n2:119_0: Yathākkamamāgamanakiriyāya thūlattaguṇena gomantadabbena ca sambandhaṁ dassetuṁ ‘taṁ yathe’ccādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:119_1: udāharaṇamattaṁ dassentopi iminā adhippāyenāpi dassetīti vuttaṁ ‘sabbattheva vā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:119_2: puttena sahāgatotiādīsu āgamanādikiriyampaṭicca dve kattāro padhānāppadhānavasena,
anya-e0806n2:119_3: tesu padhāne kāriyasampaccayañāyena vā bahulaṁvacanena vā padhāne kattari paccayo,
anya-e0806n2:119_7: tulyopi kiriyāsambandhe pitāputtānaṁ pitātra padhānaṁ saddacoditattā,
anya-e0806n2:119_12: tathā vidhā hi saddassa satti yato piturevātra kiriyā sambandhaṁ sakkoti paṭipādetuṁ, na puttassa,
anya-e0806n2:119_13: evañcāgatoccādo ekavacanamupajjate, aññathā hi bahuvacanaṁ siyā, ‘pitā puttā āgatā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:119_14: (Yadi) vuttanayena tatiyā siddhā ‘siddhe satyārambho niyamāya vā vikappāya vā’ na cettha niyamo, nāpi vikappo,
anya-e0806n2:119_15: tato kimanena yogenā tyāsayenāha-‘appadhāneyeva’ccādi. Nayidamevamiccādi parihāro.
anya-e0806n2:119_17: sāmatthiyāti bhedādhiṭṭhānattā sahatthayogassa puttassāpi kiriyābhisambandho viññāyati kathamaññathā sahatthayogo siyāti iminā attha balena.
anya-e0806n2:119_19: Pariyāyatthanti parito ayanti avagacchanti atthamaneneti pariyāyo attho payojanaṁ yassāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n2:119_21: atoyeva vināpi sahasaddappayogaṁ tappariyāyappayogaṁ vā sahatthena yoge vidhānato asatyapi sahādisaddappayoge yattha tadattho gamyate tatthāpi bhavatyeva tatiyā… gamyamānena sahatthena yogā, yathā‘‘syādi syāne’’ti.
anya-e0806n2:119_23: Visesānupādānatoti ‘‘sahayutte-ppadhāne’’ti (2-3-19) pāṇinīya sutte viya appadhāneti visesassānupādānato.
anya-e0806n2:121_1: atthe kāriyassāsambhavā taṁvācīhi vibhattīti maññamānena yaṁvivaraṇaṁ kataṁ ‘lakkhaṇe vattamānato’ti,
anya-e0806n2:121_3: vattamānatoti viññāyati… nāmasmā paccayavidhānappa saṅgato, upāttoti gahito.
anya-e0806n2:121_4: Kañcippaṇaramāpannassa lakkhaṇe tatiyā yathā siyā ‘rukkhampati vijjotana’miccatra lakkhaṇamatte mā bhavīti pāṇinīyehi ‘‘itthambhūtalakkhaṇe’’ti (2-3-21) itthambhūtaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0806n2:121_8: tathāhi ‘tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhī’ti manussattasāmaññassa paribbājakattampakāro, tamparibbājako patto, tassa tidaṇḍakaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:121_9: Upalakkhaṇatteti iminā itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇattābhāvamāha, upalakkhaṇanti saṅketo. Nayidamatthiccādi parihāro,
anya-e0806n2:121_10: rukkhampati vijjotananti ettha kassaci itthambhūtassābhāvā itthambhūtaggahaṇe payojanaṁ na dissati tannivattanato,
anya-e0806n2:121_11: rukkhampati vijjotateti etthatu itthambhūtassa vijjusaṅkhātassa atthassa sabbhāvā tatiyāppattiyaṁ taṁnivattiyā yathāvuttaṁ ñāyamantarena nāññaṁ kiñci paṭisaraṇamatthīti saññāpayamāha-‘avassa’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_13: itthambhūtavādino uttaramāsaṅkiyāha-‘nacā’tiādi, vattunti vacanaseso, co-vadhāraṇe, neva sakkāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:121_14: dutiyāvidhānasāmatthiyāti ‘‘patiparīhi bhāge cā’’ti (2-9) kasmā na sakkāti āha-‘atthi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_16: Atha kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assāti ādo tatiyā kasmā na siyā tyāha-‘kamaṇḍalu’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_17: kamaṇḍalussa setassa ca upalakkhaṇa bhāvenānupādānatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:121_21: Yenāṅgena vikatena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate tato tatiyā yathāsiyāti parehi ‘‘yenāṅgavikāro’’ti (2-3-20) āraddhaṁ, tadāha-‘yene’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_22: tattha yasaddena vikatāvayavo hetuttena niddiṭṭho aṅgasaddo ca samudāyavacano upātto tenāha-‘yeneccādi,
anya-e0806n2:121_23: nanuca kāṇādīnaṁ niyataguṇīnamabhidhāyittā akkhisaddassa payogo na yutto byāvattiyābhāvāti, nesa doso, lokiyo-yaṁ saddassa vohāro,
anya-e0806n2:121_25: tathāhi lokena ‘sīsapāti’pi vuccate, rukkho sīsapātipi, yassa tu tatthādaro, so-kkhisaddaṁ payujjateva,
anya-e0806n2:121_27: akkhi(nāti) hi vutte sandeho siyā ‘kimassa vattumicchita’nti tato kāṇoti vuccate,
anya-e0806n2:121_29: akkhikāṇamassetyādo kasmā na siyāti āsaṅkiya‘kamaṇḍalu pāṇimhi assā’tyatra yo vutto parihāro,
anya-e0806n2:123_1: Ekatra hi diṭṭhasāmatthiyottho taṁyoggatāya kāriya (ma)karontopi hetu vuccate sati saha kārinyasati ca vidhurappaccayo papā(ta) to, tena kāriyassa byabhicāro,
anya-e0806n2:125_1: parāṅgabhūteti parassa bandhattā(dino) vidhānā yāṅgabhūte jaḷattādihetumhīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:125_4: yañhi paratthamupādīyate tadappadhānamanu vādarūpenopādīyamānattā, yathā ‘jaḷattā baddho, rukkho yaṁ sīsa pattā, aggi ettha dhumatte’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:125_8: nanu ‘to pañcamyā’’ti (4-95) suttena taddhitapaccayantassa kathaṁ pañcamyantatā tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘pañcaminiddese’ iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:125_10: vā pañcamiyā vidhānato tatiyārūpenapi bhavitabbanti codanamanasi nidhāya pañcamyu dāharaṇeyeva kāraṇaṁ tatiyodāharaṇassa ca paṭhamodāharaṇānusārenānu mantabbatañcadassento āha ‘pañcamyāyevi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:129_0: Nāmabhūtehīti sabbādīsu keci kesañci yadi nāmāni siyuṁ tehi,
anya-e0806n2:131_1: pūjānuggahakāmatta mantarena sammāpadānaṁ na sambhavatīti āha-‘pūjā’ iccādi, tenāti yathāvuttenatthena,
anya-e0806n2:131_3: idāni sampadānalakkhaṇaṁ sappabhedamāvikātukāmo āha-‘tadida’miccādi, nanirākarotītya nirākaraṇaṁ, ārādhayatītyārādhanaṁ, abbhanujānātītyabbhanuññaṁ, tesaṁ vasena,
anya-e0806n2:131_6: rukkhādikaṁ taṁ sampadānaṁ vibhāgena dassetumāha-‘tattha hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:131_7: ajjhesanenārādhanena sampadānaṁ bhavatīti sambandho, anumatiyā abbhanujānena,
anya-e0806n2:133_0: Payojanapariyāye atthasadde sati idanti payojanaṁ parāmaṭṭhuṁ sakkāti ‘tasseda’ntiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:133_2: attha kathanametanti iminā vacanicchāya metissaṁ natthi samāsoti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n2:133_3: viggahe vāsmimimasmāyeva nipātanā samāso daṭṭhabbo,so vikatisaṅkhāto attho,
anya-e0806n2:133_5: koyaṁ tadattha bhāvo ccāha-‘tadatthabhāvo nāmā’tiādi, nimittaṁ yūpādivikati,
anya-e0806n2:133_7: tesaṁ sambandho tadatthasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ tadatthabhāvo nāmāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:133_8: hetu hetumantabhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:133_9: padhānāvacchedaguṇasmāti vidhīyamānattena padhānassa purisassa ācchedakā visesakā guṇā,
anya-e0806n2:133_12: yadā upādīyateti vatvā upādīyamānappakāraṁ diṭṭhantena phuṭayitumāha-‘yathā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:133_13: yūpo nimittaṁ yassa dāruno taṁ tathā vuttaṁ nāññanimittanti yadā nimityavacchedakattenupādīyate tadā nimittasaddatova catutthī sambandho, tato aññanimittato,
anya-e0806n2:133_14: nimittanimittīnaṁ sambandhassa abhimukhabhāvena tattheva nimitte pavattīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:134_0: Piṇiyamānā kiṁ saddādivacanīyā paro sāduādiko yo-ttho so añño kattā yassa so aññakattuko-bhilāso,
anya-e0806n2:134_1: abhilāso rucīti iminā dityādyanekatthantopi rucisaddo-bhilāse ruḷhova gayhatīti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:134_2: sā ruci attho-bhidheyyo yesaṁ bhe tadatthā,
anya-e0806n2:134_4: iminā ca kiñcāpi rucirayaṁ yassuppajjateyo vā tassā janako, tesamubhinnampi atthi,
anya-e0806n2:134_6: ajanakopi so tāya saṁsattoti tasseva piṇiyamānassa sampadānasaññā,
anya-e0806n2:134_9: iminā ca udāharaṇānamasamāna rūpattameva catutthīvidhāne kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:134_10: aññathā chaṭṭhīyeva tehipi vidhīyeyya kāraṇāsambhavā kāraṇasabbhāvā hi dīpeti,
anya-e0806n2:134_15: natthi añño kattā yassā sā anaññakattukā ruci,
anya-e0806n2:134_16: bhāya ruciyā sambandhino piṇiyamānassa sampadānasaññaṁ ye pana icchantīti sambandho, ye pana āhu cātisambandho, uppajjanamuppatti, kassa uppatti, ruciyā,
anya-e0806n2:134_17: uppattiyā ādhāro uppatyādhāro‘devadattāya rocate’ccādo devadattādiṁ upalakkhetīti uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:134_18: ettha ruciyā uppatyādhāropalakkhaṇameva vacananti sāvadhāraṇa mattho daṭṭhabbo… sabbesaṁ vākyānamavadhāraṇaphalattā,
anya-e0806n2:134_19: tena piṇiya mānavacanamabhilāsassa aññakattukatāsandassanaparaṁ na hotīti byavacchinnambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:134_20: tesaṁ kaccāyanassa cehāpi pasajjatīti sambandho, ihāpīti tvamiti etthāpi,
anya-e0806n2:134_23: atippasaṅgocāti ‘‘kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesī’’tiādo tavāti anabhimataṭṭhānappattica.
anya-e0806n2:135_1: uttamīṇo adhamīṇoti dhanikagahetūnaṁ ruḷhītyāha-‘uttamīṇo dhanasāmī’ti, uttamīṇamassāti uttamīṇo,
anya-e0806n2:135_3: Suttantarena (taṁ taṁ) niyamena niyamitānaṁ tesaṁtesaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ vidhāya catutthī vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n2:135_9: yassāti iminā yaṁkārakanti vuttameva parāmasati, yassāti rājādino, pucchatīti pucchiyate ,
anya-e0806n2:135_10: teneva vakkhati-‘yassa sambandhiṁ subhāsubhaṁ pucchati nemittiko’ti,
anya-e0806n2:135_11: yocānukūlattambha jatīti iminā idaṁ dasseti ‘‘patipubbako āpubbakoca suṇoti abbhupagame paṭijānaneca vattate,
anya-e0806n2:135_12: yadāyamabbhupagamo patthanā pubbato bhavati tadā patthanāya kattu patthayituno catutthī rūpambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:135_13: yadātvapatthatampi kevalamānukūlyena vattamānaṁdisvā deyyamabbhupagacchanti idamidaṁ vodassāmāti kopissasāmāti (potthake) tadānukūlyena pavattanasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya kattuno catutthīrūpambhavatī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:135_15: so hi ‘‘abbhupagamo nāma parena patthitassa bhavati tattha patthayituyeva catutthīrūpambhavatī’’ti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:135_16: pubbassākiriyāya yo kattāti vedavākyena vihitathutikakaraṇa saṅkhātāya ussāhānujānanato pubbabhūtāya kiriyāya yo kattā hotā potā ca,
anya-e0806n2:135_19: rūpasāmyato pana tādatthiyatthasabbhāvāca yathāyogaṁ tādatthha catutthīpi na virujjhati,
anya-e0806n2:135_21: kamma vacanicchāti iminā vacanicchāya padhānattamāha… vacanicchābhimukhattā sabbesaṁ kārakānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:135_23: upatiṭṭhate upaṭṭhānaṁ upagamanaṁ karoti, pihayanti patthenti, kujjha amarisaṁ karoti,
anya-e0806n2:135_24: duhanādayo kopappabhavā nānantarena te sambhavantīti dūbhādayopyudāhaṭā ‘‘byañjane dīgharassā’’ti (1-33) rasse aparajjhāmi, issayanti nasahanti,
anya-e0806n2:135_28: yācitusmāyeva yācituyeva (potthake) chaṭṭhīti nāvassamayanniyamoti attho, kutoccāha-‘sambandhe’ccādi, aññasmāpīti ayācitutoapi,
anya-e0806n2:135_29: thutikaraṇassa kattubhūtā hotāpotāro ussāhanānujānanānaṁ kammaṁ hotīti āha-‘paccanupubbassa giṇātissa kamme’ti.
anya-e0806n2:135_34: Ettha pana tathā paṭisedhābhāvepi bahulādhikārato ‘na taṁ nāvammaññe nataṁ annammaññe’ccādi bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:135_37: etthaca yadā tiṇāditopi khikaṁsīyate tadā nindāvagamo,
anya-e0806n2:135_38: tattha ca niyogatova nañpayogo ñāthānupa pattiyāti sappaṭisedhamudāhaṭaṁ ‘na maññamāno’ti, avadhimhiyeva pañcamītiṇāti,
anya-e0806n2:135_39: nañpayogeva niyogato nindāvagamā tiṇanti kammeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:135_40: athavā satīpi nindāvagame vacanicchāto savisayeyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:135_42: catutthiṁ icchantīti mattāyāti ettha catutthiṁ icchanti,
anya-e0806n2:135_44: caṇḍassa kukkurassātiādisutte ‘‘atha so’’ti pāṭhassa vijjamānattā ‘bhiyyoso mattāyā’ti ettha sokāro punaruttoti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:140_0: Etthāyamattho ‘‘yatokutocipi attho kiñci vatthuavadhīyate saṁyogassa vā kiriyānimittaṁ gamanadānādikiriyāpubbaṁ visilissate sayaṁ vā apeti aññena vā visuṁ karīyate,
anya-e0806n2:140_1: tamevaṁvidhaṁ calañcā calañca visilesaparicchedabhūtaṁ padatthamavadhiṁ vadanti budhā tabbiduno’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:140_2: taṁ yathā dhāvatāssā puriso patati, purisaṁ pāteti vā, rukkhā paṇṇaṁ patati, paṇṇaṁ pāteti vāti,
anya-e0806n2:143_0: Tattha niddiṭṭhā vacanopanītā kiriyā visayo yattha so niddiṭṭha visayo vadhi, yathā-‘gāmasmā āgato’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_1: upāttājjhāhaṭā kiriyā visayo yattha so upāttavisayo,
anya-e0806n2:143_4: anumeyyā kiriyā visayo yattha so anumeyyavisayo,
anya-e0806n2:143_7: atoyevetthāyameva saññā paripphuṭā viññāyatīti na kācidiha saññā paribhāsīyate byāmohakāriṇī,
anya-e0806n2:143_8: athāvadhismāti vuccamāne ‘padatthāvadhismā’ti kuto-vasīyate yenevaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katantyāsaṅkiyāha-padāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n2:143_9: Yathā gāmasmātiādinā idaṁ dīpeti ‘‘na kevalaṁ kāyasaṁsaggapubbakova visileso,
anya-e0806n2:143_12: tathāhi corehi bhāyatityādo yo (bhaya)pekkhaṇa sīlo bhavati, so yadi maṁ corā passeyyuṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_13: dhuvaṁ me maraṇanti vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tato nivattate,
anya-e0806n2:143_14: tathā corehi tāyatityādo yo ekassa mitto bhavati so yadyetaṁ corā passeyyuṁ dhuvamassa maraṇanti passanto te buddhiyā patvā tato nivattayatītyavadhittā avadhismāva sabbattha pañcamī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_15: parehi pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattuvisesānuggahāya sutteheva papañco kato,
anya-e0806n2:143_16: idha pana sāmaññavacaneneva siddhattā tadanuggahāya udāharaṇeheva papañcitaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_17: bhītibhāyanatthānanti bhīti tāyanānaṁ attho yesaṁ te bhītitāyanatthā tesanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_18: nanu bhītyatthānaṁ payoge bhayahetu sambhavati natu tāyanatthānanti, nesa doso,
anya-e0806n2:143_19: tāyanañhi rakkhanamuccate sāyanāhi rakkhanamuppajjabhe (potthake) tañca bhayahetuto vetyāha-‘yo bhayahetu’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_20: iminā ca ‘‘bhītyatthānaṁ bhayahetu’’ti (1-4-25) pāṇiniyānamapādānasaññā suttampaṭikkhipati, tatoti bhayahetuto, tesanti bhayatāyanānaṁ, bhayamaniṭṭhapātasaṅkā, uttāsotyattho,
anya-e0806n2:143_26: taṁ yathā ‘valāhako vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate’ti.
anya-e0806n2:143_47: maññamāno sissā ahaṁ kathannāma byavahito bhavāmīti antaradhāne byavadhāna nimittaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_53: ‘‘antaradhāneti kiṁ core na didikkhatī’’ti paccudāhaṭaṁ parehi,
anya-e0806n2:143_55: tra hi yo core na didikkhati tehi attano adassanamicchatīti na antaradhānanimittaṁ, kintupaghātanivatyatthaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_59: Icchatiggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ adassanicchāyaṁ sati satyapi dassane yathāsiyā’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_61: satīpi dassaneti upajjhāyena dassane satīpi, tatoti upajjhāyato,
anya-e0806n2:143_65: upayogavacanasāmatthiyā vijjāgahaṇatthaṁ sissavattaṁ niyamo, tatoti ākhyātuto.
anya-e0806n2:143_66: ‘‘Janikattuno pakatī’’ti (1-4-30) saññāsuttaṁ kataṁ, tadāha-‘janyatthassā’tiādi, janino attho janyattho, kintaṁ jananaṁ, tatoti janikattuhetuto,
anya-e0806n2:143_67: pakatisaddena kāraṇamattaṁ gahitaṁparehi ‘puttā pamodā jāyate’ccādo puttāditopi yathā siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_73: kārakantaravacanicchāyanti ettha kārakantarādivacanicchāyanti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ… etthantare sambandha vacanicchāyapi sambhavato, tatra tiṭṭhantīti tatraṭṭhā, tesaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_75: navattu paṭibaddhāti lokavacanicchamullaṅgiya ahameva vadāmīti sakajjhāsayena vadanto vattā,
anya-e0806n2:143_78: paṭhamato upalabbhatīti atthakathanena janyattho-tra na sambhavatīti vadati, nahi himavā gaṅgāya kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_85: ‘‘Aññārāditararite disāsaddāñcuttarapadācāhi yutte’’ti (2-3-29) suttitaṁ, tadāha-‘aññasaddayoge’ccādi, yatoti devadattādito, ‘‘aññaityatthaggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_86: tena pariyāyappayogepi bhavatī’’ti aññehi byākhyātattā āha-‘bhinno devadattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_87: ārāsaddassa dūratthattā āsavakkhayato ārā dūro bhavatī(tyattho u) pādīyatetyāha‘ārāsaddo dūrattho’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_88: niddissamānapaṭiyogīti ‘devadatto sūro’ti niddissamānassa kassaci yo so dutiyo, so paṭiyogī.
anya-e0806n2:143_89: Disādesakālavuttīnaṁ disāsaddattena pariggahato āha‘disā desakālavācīnaṁ yoge’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_92: ‘‘Pañcamīvidhāne lyaplope kammanyupasaṅkhyānaṁ ‘‘adhikaraṇe copasaṅkhyāna’’miti (2-3-28-vā) vāttikaṁ, tadāha‘yattha’ccādi, lyappaccayassa yatrāppayogo, tassattho ce gamyate, so lyaplopo, tvālopo lyapalopotyaviseso,
anya-e0806n2:143_93: pāsāda māruyha pekkhati āsane upavisitvā pekkhatīti idaṁ visayo padassanaṁ pubbaṁ yassāti kiriyāvisesane samāso,
anya-e0806n2:143_94: vakkhamānasabbadassanesupi pāsādato-pakkamanalesasabbhāvā pāsādo (yevā) vadhirūpena vattumiṭṭhoti dassetumāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_95: apakkamati tato taṁ dassananti tato pāsādato tassa daṭṭhuno dassanaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ apakkamatyapayātītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:143_97: te hyevamācikkhanti ‘‘indriyesu cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhugoḷakato-ccantasukhumabhāvena nikkhamma visālībhavantaṁ visayadesamupagamma sakalamattanā diṭṭhaṁ passati raṁsirūpena,
anya-e0806n2:143_98: yathā kāhalā mūle kisā aggemahatī, tathā ñāṇindriyānī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_102: adhiṭṭhāna manindriyaṁ nāpajjateti sambandho, tatoti pāsādato, apakkantyāti apagamanena,
anya-e0806n2:143_105: indriyādhiṭṭhānampatte visaye viññāṇalakkhaṇaṁ kāriyaṁ karonti sīlenāti pattakārīni,
anya-e0806n2:143_108: atra hi cattāro pakkhā pattakārīnindriyāni, appattakārīni,
anya-e0806n2:143_111: catusveva tesu paṭhamapakkhadvayamupanyasya paṭipāditaṁ… tappaṭipādanenetaresampi paṭipāditattā,
anya-e0806n2:143_112: sabbasāmayikasādhāraṇattāsaddasatthassāti idaṁ ayuttamiva dissati… saddasatthassimassa buddhavacanopayogittena sogatasamayānuguṇappavattito,
anya-e0806n2:143_114: manasikārādītiādisaddena cakkhuto cakkhunā (potthake) abhedo rūpāpāthagamo ca dassito,
anya-e0806n2:143_118: pucchanākhyānesu sāmaññena pañcamīvidhāne-tippasaṅgaṁ dassetumāha-‘avassa’miccādi, kassāti pañho, devadattassetyākhyānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_122: nimīyate paricchijjate yena taṁ nimānaṁ, tadeva nimmānaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:143_125: taṁ yuttā pañcamiyutthā parassāddhassa paṭhamā ca sattamī ca vattabbā’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:143_128: atra hi yadā rājagahassa yojanañcābhedo vattumicchīyate,
anya-e0806n2:143_131: Tathāhi pāṭaliputtasmā sattasu yojanesu sati rājagahaṁbhavatītyayamattho patīyate,
anya-e0806n2:143_133: Sambandhe chaṭṭhīti iminā ‘‘taṁ yuttā kāle sattamī vattabbā’’ti (2-3-28vā) vacanampaṭikkhipati.
anya-e0806n2:143_136: guṇe hetumhīti guṇapadatthe hetubhūte ‘‘guṇe’’ti (2-21) pañcamīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_139: yadātviccādinā paresaṁ viya karaṇe visuṁ vidhāne payojanaṁ natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:143_142: samānādhikaraṇattenāti ca ‘rañño puriso’tyādo asamānādhikaraṇassāpi visesanattadassanato vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_143: samānādhikaraṇattena visesanabhāvo cāssa thokaguṇānvite calane vattamāno thokasaddo asattavacanova visesananti,
anya-e0806n2:143_147: avadhisambandhalakkhaṇāti avadhisambandhāva lakkhaṇaṁ nimittamāsaṁ pañcamīchaṭṭhīnaṁ tā tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n2:143_149: evaṁ carahi taṁtaṁ kārakavacanicchāyamaññāpi vibhattiyo kasmā nappayujjeyyunti āha-‘lokiyā cetthā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:143_150: ettha vibhattīnaṁ niyame lokiyā eva vacanicchā nibandhanaṁ kāraṇanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:143_152: ‘‘pañcamyadhikaraṇeca’’ (2-3-36) iccatra ca kārena dūranti katthehi sattamī ca vuttā pāṭi padikatthe sārasaṅgahakārādīhi,
anya-e0806n2:143_153: tadakkhippa aññāpadesena paṭikkhipituṁ kecityādi yaṁ vuttaṁ vuttiyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:143_155: Dūrāpādāvasecananti ayaṁ tesampaṭikkhepana yoti sambandho, itisaddo panettha parihīno,
anya-e0806n2:143_156: nahitantiādīsu tasaddenāsattarūpaṁ dūrādi vattumicchitantyavaseyaṁ, na hi taṁ gamyate, na hi tato gamyate, na hi tena gamyate,
anya-e0806n2:143_157: na hi tasmiṁ ṭhīyate’ti visuṁ sambandho vaseyo.
anya-e0806n2:143_159: atoceti vakkhamānahetuparāmāso, yanti yasmā atthe nipāto, vākyakāro vararuci,
anya-e0806n2:143_163: tathāhyatrāyaṁ mahābhāssa pāṭho ‘‘dūrantikatthehi pañcamīvidhāne taṁyuttā pañcamīpaṭisedho vattabbo dūrā gāmassa,
anya-e0806n2:143_164: tatrāpi dassanā anatthako-yampaṭisedho, tatrāpi hi pañcamī dissati–
anya-e0806n2:145_0: Guruto kupitā dūrā,bhābyaṁ dūrā ca dassuhiti.
anya-e0806n2:146_3: dūrasmāvasathāti āvasathassa dūreti atthohi bhāssapadīpe keyyaṭo,
anya-e0806n2:146_4: paṭhamo puriso yassa so paṭhamapuriso bhavati ‘‘dūrantikā’’di (2-6-5) kaccāyanasutte suddhādiyogopi saṅgahito,
anya-e0806n2:146_6: ‘‘dhātunāmānamupasaggayogādīsvapica’’ iti (2-6-2) sutte caggahaṇato pabhutiyogo ca gahito, tenāha–‘pabhuti yogecā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:148_0: Nanu phuṭova tesaṁ sālādīnaṁ yogoti kimettha pañhena kassa panetehi yogo’tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘vajjanaṁ hiccādi, vajjanānanti kattari ano,
anya-e0806n2:148_1: vajjane sambandhe vattamānehīti vajjanasaṅkhāte sambandhe vatta mānehi apaparīhi, yuttasmāti yuttatova ekasmā, nāññato,
anya-e0806n2:148_2: kimettha vattabbanti iminā apaparīhi yuttasmāva pañcamībhavane pasiddhattamāha,
anya-e0806n2:148_4: yadatthoti yosālādi attho payojanaṁ yassa vajjanakiriyā rambhassa so yadattho.
anya-e0806n2:148_5: ‘‘Pañcamyapāparīhī’’ti (2-3-10) āyuttepi pañcamī vidhīyate parehi, tadāha-‘mariyādāya’miccādi, avadhimā ettha vassanaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:150_1: tassa kāriyatthanti tassa mukhyassa yaṁ kāriyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:150_4: vinimayeti parivattana nimittaṁ paṭidānecāti ca saddassāṭṭhānappayutti daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0806n2:152_0: Yadi vajjanakiriyāya sambajjhamānassa kammattā kamme dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:152_2: paṭipadaṁ ujukamevoccāritaṁ vidhānaṁ yassā sā paṭipadavidhānā, visesavidhāna vatītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:152_3: yajjatra dutiyāvacanaṁ na siyā tadā ritesaddena yoge ujukaṁ vidhīyamānāya pañcamiyā dutiyā bādhīyethāti maññate.
anya-e0806n2:152_4: Yadyatra pañcamiyā dutiyāya bādhābhāvo eva payojanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:152_5: evañcarahi ‘rite vā’ti suttayitabbaṁ evaṁ sati pakkhe dutiyā ca bhavissati,
anya-e0806n2:152_6: lahu ca suttampaṇītambhavatī tyāsaṅkiya payojanantaramāha-‘uttaratthañce’ti, atoyevāti uttaratthattāyeva,
anya-e0806n2:152_8: āhacca kaṇṭhādiṭṭhāne vāyunāāhanitvā āharitvā vā vacanaṁ āhaccavacanaṁ, ujukavacananti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:154_0: Na dutiyāpi yogavibhāgatoti evaṁ maññate ‘‘tatiyā ceti vattamāne tattha yadi cakārena ‘dutiyā ce’ti sambandhīyeyya,
anya-e0806n2:154_1: tatrāpi ca kārena pañcamītyevaṁ na kassāpyapakaṁsoti‘vināññatraputhanānāhi tatiyā ce’tyekayogamakatvā yogavibhāgasāmatthiyā ‘tatiyā ce’ti ca kārena jātu pañcamī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:154_2: asahāyatthatte sati ‘vinātthe hī’tyevamavatvā kiṁ visuṁ suttaracanāyetyāha-‘bhedo pādānantvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:156_0: Yantaṁ saddānaṁ niccattā sambandhassa yatthāti parāmaṭṭhaṁ soti,
anya-e0806n2:156_2: yo yatthetyādikañca ‘kiriyādhārabhūte’ccādivuttigantha vivaraṇanti yoti kiriyādheyyabhūtādhippetā, etanevāha‘kiriyā cā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:156_3: tenāyamādhārīyati kattukamma samavetā kiriyāsmintyadhikaraṇe vā taṁ ādhārayatīti kattari vā ghaṇantena daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:156_4: kattāraṁ kammañca kiriyānissayabhūtamādhāra yatītyādhāroti vā kattari ghaṇa, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n2:159_0: Nanu ca kiriyādhāraṇenādhārotyuccate, taṁ kimevamuccateti ce,
anya-e0806n2:159_3: nahyaññatā taddhāraṇaṁ sambhavati tato kiriyā kāraṇenādhāraṇenādhārotya yamevattho,
anya-e0806n2:159_6: nanu yadyapyujukameva kiriyaṁ dhārayati kattā kattusamavāyiniṁ,
anya-e0806n2:159_7: kammasamavetañca viktedanādiṁ kiriyaṁ kammaṁ… tathā sati tānevādhāroti,
anya-e0806n2:159_8: na… loke satthe ca tesamādhāratthe nāppatītito,
anya-e0806n2:159_9: kattukammatāyeva hi tesampatītīti dassetumāha-‘kiriyā ce’tyādi, tathā ca vuttaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:162_0: Kattukammabyavahitanti kattukammehi taṁsamavetabhāvena byavahitaṁ, anuju pārampariyena,
anya-e0806n2:162_1: kriyāsiddhupakāriti kattukammasamavetāya kiriyāya pasiddhiyaṁ upakārī upakubbantaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:162_3: kattukammānaṁ dhāraṇenāpyādhāroti sakkā vavatthapetunti codanammanasi nidhāyāha-‘na ce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:162_7: ādheyyena sahopasileso saṁyogalakkhaṇo-ssa atthīti opasilesiko ādhāro-‘kaṭenisīdati thāliyaṁ pacati’tyādo kaṭādi,
anya-e0806n2:162_8: tathāhi devadattasamavetaṁ nisīdanakiriyaṁ kaṭo devadattaṁ dhārayaṁ dhārayati devadattabyavahitaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:162_9: evaṁ thālīpi taṇḍulasamavetaṁ vikledanādikiriyaṁ taṇḍule dhārayaṁ dhārayatītyopasilesikādhārattaṁ kaṭādino.
anya-e0806n2:162_10: Yato-ññatrādheyyaṁ na vattate sabbathā bhiyyo vā, so vesayiko,
anya-e0806n2:162_12: yathā cakkhādippavattīnamaññatrābhāvā cakkhādīnaṁ rūpādayo visayāti vuccante,
anya-e0806n2:162_13: evamākāse sakunayotyādo sakunyādīnamākāsādito-ññatrābhāvāte tesaṁ visayātyuccante, visayo eva vesayiko.
anya-e0806n2:162_15: dadhimhi sappi,tyatra tilādikaṁ telādikamādheyyaṁ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti tilādi byāpakādhāro. Samīpe bhavo, samīpo eva vā sāmīpiko,
anya-e0806n2:162_16: yassa samīpadese ādheyyaṁ vattate so evamuccate,
anya-e0806n2:162_18: Nanu cātrāpyādhāre sattamī vidhīyate ādhāro ca nissayo vuccate,
anya-e0806n2:162_20: na ca sissādīnaṁ guruppabhutīti devadattasakunyādīnamiva kaṭākāsādīhi saṁyogo,
anya-e0806n2:162_21: telādīnamiva ca tilādīhi samavāyo vā atthi,
anya-e0806n2:162_23: yadāyattā hi yassa ṭhiti so vināpi saṁyogasamavāyehi tassa nissayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:162_24: tathāhi purisassa na raññā saha saṁyogosamavāyo vātthi,
anya-e0806n2:162_25: atha pana tadadhīnaṭṭhitittā rājanissayo purisoti byapadissīyate,
anya-e0806n2:162_26: sissādīnañca guruppabhutina māyattā ṭhitīti tesamayaṁ tenassāyaṁ (potthake) yuttho te pati gurupabhutīnaṁ nissayabhāvo (jinindabuddhi) yutto guruppabhutinaṁ nissayabhāvoti,
anya-e0806n2:162_29: nāññathā opasilesikena vā opasilesikeva visayābhibyāpakānamaggahaṇato upasilesasse vā upasilesasseva paribyattattā tatheva vohāroti na saṅkaro saṅkanīyoti.
anya-e0806n2:166_0: Yassa kiriyāti yassa gavādyatthassa sambandhinī dohanādikiriyā,
anya-e0806n2:168_0: Sāmissarādiyoge chaṭṭhīsattamiyo yathā siyunti ‘‘sāmissarādhipatidāyādasakkhipatibhūpasutehi ca ‘‘iti (2-3-39) āraddhaṁ parehi, tadāha-‘sāmi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:168_1: atra ca jinindabuddhinā ‘‘sāmyādīnaṁ bhedeno pādānaṁ pariyāyantaranivatyatthamiha mā hotu gāmassa rājā’’ti vuttaṁ vākyamupanyasya hassāpya yuttattamupadassayamāha-‘sāmissare’ccādi, kena nivārīyate, na kenāpītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:168_3: ‘‘āyuttakusalehyāsevāya’’mīti (2-3-40) āraddhaṁ, tadāha-‘āyutte’ccādi, āsavā tapparatā, byāvaṭo niyutto,
anya-e0806n2:168_4: tatthedaṁ siyā ‘‘āsevāyanti vakkhāmī tyavassaṁ vacanamidamārabbhanīyamaññathā īsaṁyuttepi ‘āyutto go sakaṭassā’ti pasajjatī’’tyāsaṅkiya natthevetampi payojananti dassetumāha-‘vināpi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:168_6: tenevāti kaccāyanasutte pasūtasaddānantaraṁ kusalasaddaniddeseneva, idhāti moggallānavuttiyaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:168_7: Kaccāyanena ‘‘kammakaraṇa nimittatthesu sattamī’’ (2-6-40) ‘‘pañcamyatthe ca’’ (2-6-41) iti ca suttitaṁ, tenāha-‘kamme’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:168_9: kaccāyanānaṁ‘bhikkhūsū’tiādīni kammatthe udāharaṇāni, hatthesūtiādīni karaṇatthe, kadalīsūti pañcamyatthe.
anya-e0806n2:168_10: ‘‘Maṇḍitussukkesu tatiyā ce’’ti (2-6-45) kaccāyanasuttaṁ, tadāha ‘pasannatthe’ccādi, pasannattheti maṇḍitatthe, ussukkattheti ussāhatthe.
anya-e0806n2:170_2: tattha yadā samudāyassā-dhikaraṇattaṁ vattumicchīyate, tadā sattamī siddhāva, yathā rukkhe sākhāti,
anya-e0806n2:170_4: yathā rukkhassa sākhāti saccametaṁ papañcatthantu vacana’’nti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:170_5: tañceta mayuttantidassento āha-‘na sālayo’ccādisūkayuttānidhaññāni sūkadhaññāni, āhitā avaṭṭhitā, ādheyya bhūtāti vuttaṁ hoti. Yatoti āhitattakāraṇā,
anya-e0806n2:170_8: sutato sakāsā sīlaṁ atisayena seyyoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:170_9: ‘‘niddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī sattamīsu pattesu tadapavādo, yaṁ yogo’’ti parehākhyāyate,
anya-e0806n2:170_10: tattha tāva niddhāraṇamevettha natthi kuto chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ tatthappavatti,
anya-e0806n2:170_17: Sādhunipuṇehi yoge pūjāyaṁ gammamānāyaṁ sattamī, tathā asādhuyoge,
anya-e0806n2:170_19: tathā lopantanakkhattasaddā ca tena tena vacanantarena pāṇiniyehi vihitā,
anya-e0806n2:170_20: taṁ sabbaṁ taṁtaṁkārakavacanicchāyameva sādhetuṁ ‘mātari sādhu’ iccādayo udāhaṭā kesesu pasito pasatto, avabaddhoti attho,
anya-e0806n2:170_23: phusseninduyuttena lakkhito kālo soyamityabhedena sambandhā phusse, tena karaṇabhūtena.
anya-e0806n2:172_0: Paṭhamātthamatteti ettake vuttepi vākyattho padattho vā na viññāyate nāmaggahaṇānuvattitoti dassetumāha-‘dvedvekānekādi suttato’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:172_1: nāmenāttho paṭipādiyamāno nāmasaṅkhāte-ttani abhidheyyattenājjhāropya paṭipādayatyanapekkhita vibhattivisesanti āha-‘abhidhīyati’ccādi, pakatirūpenāti nāmena, tassa abhidheyyassa,
anya-e0806n2:172_3: idaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti nāmassābhidheyyamatteti iminā idaṁ vakkhamānaṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n2:172_4: ‘‘Pāṭipadikatthaliṅgaparimāṇavacanamatte paṭhamā’’ti (2-3-46) liṅgādīsu bhedena paṭhamāvidhānampaṭipannā, tadāha-‘liṅgaparimāṇe’ccādi, liṅgaṁ itthipunnapuṁsakāni, parimāṇaṁ paricchedo, saṅkhyā ekattabahuttāni,
anya-e0806n2:172_5: tabbantopi saddatthoevāti liṅgādivantopi sarūpā byatiritto saddattho eva,
anya-e0806n2:172_7: taṁyuttassāpi saddatthabhāvato ‘uccaṁ gharāni’tyādīnipi uccattaṁ guṇaṁ nimittaṁ katvā soyamityabhedasambandha gharesu vattantīti.
anya-e0806n2:172_8: Palambate ajjhāgacchatityādo ‘‘asaṅkhyehi sabbāsaṁ’’ti (2-119) lopavidhānasāmatthiyā pādīhyanatthakehipi paṭhamā siddhāyeva.
anya-e0806n2:174_0: Abhimukhaṁ katvātiādinā yogārambhassa phalaṁ dasseti, nāmattheti saddatthe,
anya-e0806n2:179_0: Taṁ yathā bhava rājeti, nippannattho bhaveti ca.
anya-e0806n2:182_1: kiriyāya kārakehi ca nipphāditoti iminā sambandhassa kiriyākārakasambandha pubbakattamāha,
anya-e0806n2:182_2: tatoyevāyaṁ nākasmīkoti na yesaṁkesañci dvinnaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:182_4: kiriyākārakasambandhapubbako hi kārakehi añño sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho, tathā ca vuttaṁ–
anya-e0806n2:185_0: Tattha assutāyaṁ kiriyāyaṁ ‘rañño puriso’ccādo kiriyā kārakasambandhapubbako-ñño eva sassāmibhāvādiko sambandho patīyateti,
anya-e0806n2:185_6: tattha sassāmibhāvavivacchāyaṁ vijjamānopi kiriyākāraka sambandho na vattumicchito, yathā ‘anudarā kaññā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:185_11: idāni sambandhassetassa kiriyākārakasambandhasañjātattaṁ yathāyogamaññatrāpyavagamayituṁ kiñci udāharaṇamāha-‘tathā hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:185_12: paripālanakiriyākato nesaṁ sambandhoti iminā paripālyaparipālanalakkhaṇo-yaṁ sambandhoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:185_13: sā ayampari pālanalakkhaṇā kiriyā sambandhamassedambhāvahetuṁ janayitvā nivattati,
anya-e0806n2:185_14: atthappakaraṇādinā tvimāya kiriyāyāyaṁ sambandhoti viseso vasīyate,
anya-e0806n2:185_15: na chaṭṭhiyā visesāvagamane sāmatthiyaṁ… tassā sabbatthekarūpattā,
anya-e0806n2:185_16: suyyamāne eva vā kiriyāsadde kārakabhāvassa hetuno vacanicchāyābhāve assedambhābhāvasaṅkhātasseva phalassa vattumicchitattā tatheva sambandho jāto chaṭṭhiyābhidhīyate ‘rajjassa saratī’ti, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n2:188_1: tato pālanādikā upakāra sabhāvā kiriyādvinnampi tesaṁ sambandhinī bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:188_3: tatoyevatassā ubhayasambandhiniyā kiriyāya sambhaveassedanti buddhiyā hetubhūtassa aññamaññāpekkhasabhāvassa sambandhassa bhāvato kiriyājanitattamassa,
anya-e0806n2:188_5: sambandhi buddhisabbhavassāti sambandhīsu rājapurisādīsu assedanti evampavattāya buddhiyā sabbhavassa.
anya-e0806n2:188_6: Paresaṁ viya ‘‘guṇe chaṭṭhī’’ti vacanantarābhāve ubhayatthapi (cettha) (yeva) (potthake) chaṭṭhippa- saṅgoti bodhetumāha-‘nanu ce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:188_7: saccanti yathā vuttaṁ codanamabbhupagamma codakampati yathāvuttaṁ sambandharūpaṁ tato-ññatrāpyupasaṁ haritvā tattha chaṭṭhippasaṅgaṁ codetumāha-‘devadatto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:188_8: atheva miccādināsatīpiaññamaññāpekkhālakkhaṇe sambandhe vacanicchāyevettha kāraṇanti codakādhippāyamatropanetvā tadeva visesato chaṭṭhiyā abhāve samupanetuṁ‘yajjevamihāpi’ccādikamāha,
anya-e0806n2:188_10: evaṁ vattabbanti evaṁ yadipiccādinā vakkhamānanayena vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:188_11: paṭipādetabbatāyātyādinā idandīpeti ‘‘visessaṁ vidheyatāya na parādhīnanti appadhānabhāvato byatiriccate tato-ttaniṭṭhameva,
anya-e0806n2:188_16: ekassa sambandhittāsambhavā vatthuto dviṭṭho visesanagatattena patīyate tato chaṭṭhī visesanamevānudhāvati patītivisaye saddappavattī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_17: yo hi vikappanaṁ visayo so saddānanti,
anya-e0806n2:188_18: atoyeva sambandho niyamena visesanabhedamanuvidadhāti… vatthuto dviṭṭhassāpi taggatattena patītiyā yathā bhātūnaṁ dhananti,
anya-e0806n2:188_20: tathā satyapi visessa bhede visesanagatameva bhedamanu(vidadhā)ti ‘devadattassa assā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_22: visessagatattenāpi tappatītiyaṁ niyamena taggatabhedānuvidhānaṁ siyā visesanagatabhedānuvidhānamiva,
anya-e0806n2:188_24: vattupaṭibaddhameva ca dviṭṭhattaṁ manasikatvā taṁvādīhi dviṭṭho sambandhobhidhīyate,
anya-e0806n2:188_26: nīlādivisesanantu paratthattenāppadhānampi na kārakabhāvato byatiriccati… nīlādisaddenuppalādidabbābhidhānato, yathā ‘nīlamuppalampassa, nīlenuppalena ṭhitaṁ, nīlassuppalassa gandho’ti,
anya-e0806n2:188_27: yadā tu na visessapavatti tadā byatiriccateva ‘nīlassa guṇassa uppalannissayo’ti kārakabhāvalakkhaṇā padhānabhāvā byatiriccate eva nīlādi,
anya-e0806n2:188_29: tato vise- sanaṁ kiñcideva kārakarūpato padhānabhāvā byatiriccateti visesana mattenāpi sesaṁ sabbaṁ tathā siyāti nāsaṅkanīyanti.
anya-e0806n2:189_2: Sahayuttampaṭicca evanti iminā purisassa appadhānattameva dīpeti,
anya-e0806n2:189_7: aññe tu saraṇassa kiriyārūpattā kiriyantaramantareneva dabbena sambandhopapattimāhuyathā dvinnaṁ jatukato saṁsileso, jatuno tu kaṭṭhenāttanāyeva,
anya-e0806n2:189_9: Paresaṁ tatiyatthe dutiyatthe ca kitakappayoge ññatrāpi (pañcamyatthe) sattamyatthe ca (‘‘chaṭṭhī cā’’) ti (2-6-20) dutiyā pañcamīnañcā’’ti (2-6-29) ca suttantarehi chaṭṭhītimatā,
anya-e0806n2:189_11: etthāpyādo udāharaṇadvaye suttantaramantarena sampadānattābhāvā sambandhavacanicchāyameva paresampi chaṭṭhī, tenāha-‘etthā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:189_14: pañcamyatthe pana vatticchātova sabbe tasanti daṇḍassātyādīni udāharaṇāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0806n2:191_0: Anabhimatāti ‘tulyatthehyatulopamāhi tatiyāññatarissa’nti (2-3-72) suttena tulopamāhi aññehi tulyatthehi yoge tatiyāya vidhīyamānattā pāṇiniyānaṁ anabhimatā,
anya-e0806n2:191_1: yasmā sadisā bhāvā tesaṁ nopamāti ‘ajjunassa tulā natthī’tyādikamuccate,
anya-e0806n2:191_2: tasmā evaṁ yathāvuttanayenāti tadevantīmassa attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:191_3: tadevanti vā nipātasamudāyo yathāvuttanidassanattho, tulyesūti sadisesu,
anya-e0806n2:193_0: Sutte ‘ato’ti vuttaṁ ‘akārantato’ti kathaṁ vuttīti āha ‘ato’tiādi, ādesā hontīti seso,
anya-e0806n2:193_6: na pubbalopopi āgamappayogānukūlyenātipi sakkā vattunti āha-‘nacā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:193_7: niccamparalopoyevāti na ca sakkā mantunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:193_10: jhissākāravidhānaṁ ‘‘yosu jhissa pume’’ti (2-93) etadevapayojanantiādinā vuttappayojanābhāve kāraṇamāha-‘aniṭṭhattā’ti, anabhimatattāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:193_14: jhismā yonaṁ ṭāṭetivāti ‘‘jhismā yonaṁ ṭāṭe’’ti suttaṁ vā, atoti ‘ato’ iti suttaṁ, tādisassapayogassāti aggā, agge iti payogassa.
anya-e0806n2:195_2: tena hi bahuvacane bahuvacanena (potthake) paṭhamādutiyāsu ‘aṭṭhīnī’ti ekameva rūpamudāhaṭanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:197_1: asati hi ñakāre‘ñānubandho’ti ñakārena visesanena sukāro na visesī yeyya satiyeva tasmiṁ tena so visesīyeyya,
anya-e0806n2:197_2: tasmā ‘‘ñakānubandhādyantā’’ti sutte ‘ñakānubandhā’ti visesanaṁ visesanabhāvo attho payojanaṁ yassa so visesanattho,
anya-e0806n2:197_3: bahulaṁ vacanenānabhimatamanavasesaṁ vavatthāpīyatīti vuttiyaṁ ‘‘bhiyyo’’tyādikamupadiṭṭhanti dassetumupakkamate ‘sāmaññenā’tiādinā, chaṭṭhī bhavatīti (se)so,
anya-e0806n2:197_5: catutthīekavacane attattha’nti ettha saddhammasavanādikamattanimittanti yo-ttho, so cattho-ñña padatthepi,
anya-e0806n2:197_6: tassā-ññapadatthabhūtassāpi attā attho payojanambhavati nimittabhāvenāti nātthabhedoti ta eta imavajjitānaṁ sabbādīnanti ta etaimasaddehi eva vajjitānamaññesaṁ sabbādīnaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:197_7: paṭisiddhesupi kassaci ādeso dissatīti dassetumāha‘tasaddassa cā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:201_0: Ghapasaññehīti idaṁ tetimāmūhi tīmassa aññapadatthasamāsena vā visesanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:203_0: ‘‘Āgamā tagguṇībhūtā taggahaṇena gayhantī’’ti paribhāsā vacanametaṁ tattha tagguṇībhūtāti tasmiṁ āgamimhi guṇībhūtā,
anya-e0806n2:203_2: taggahaṇenāti āgamiggahaṇena taggahaṇena gahaṇatoti āgamibhūtassa naṁ iccassa gahaṇena gahaṇato,
anya-e0806n2:203_3: ‘namhi vibhattimhi’ti tu vattabbaṁ, vipallāso vā ettha daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n2:204_0: (49) Ikārassevavātiādinā vuttameva vivarati tissa iccādinā, tassa tissa,
anya-e0806n2:204_2: ‘‘namhi ticatunnamitthiyaṁ tissa catassā’’ti (2-20) tissādeso ‘‘namhi nuka dvādīnaṁ sattarasanna’’nti (2-47) nuka, tissannaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:206_3: sutte pana satīti ‘‘suña sassā’’ti sutte sati.
anya-e0806n2:208_0: Ratti ca ādi ca ratyādayo, tehi.
anya-e0806n2:212_0: Tenāti yato ltuiti visesanattena vattumicchitassa paccayassa gahaṇaṁ, tenāti attho,
anya-e0806n2:212_1: paccayassa gahaṇā tadādigahaṇaṁ labbhate… ‘‘paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito, tadādino gahaṇa’’nti ñāyā,
anya-e0806n2:212_2: visesanattena vattumicchitattā tadantaggahaṇaṁ… ‘‘vidhibbisesanantassā’’ti (1-13) vacanatoti manasi nidhāyāha- ‘yato’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:212_3: so kriyattho ādi yassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n2:212_4: so paccayo-nto yassa samudāyassa so tadanto,
anya-e0806n2:212_7: nanu ca ‘ltvī’ti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu ‘‘vidhibbisesanantassā’’ti tadantassa gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:212_8: paccayaggahaṇena pana tadādino gahaṇaṁ kathaṁ siyā vacanābhāvātyāha-‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti, yato vihito,
anya-e0806n2:212_9: tena vinā na bhavati sīlenāti tadavinābhāvī, tassa bhāvo tasmā.
anya-e0806n2:212_10: ‘‘Paccayaggahaṇe yato so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’’nti ñāyassa yattha paccayaggahaṇaṁ tattha sādhāraṇattā ‘tadādino’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:212_11: tadādisamudāyassa gahaṇe panettha viseso na dissati… adhikattāti adhigatantāvāti (potthake) ādīsu visesadassanāsambhavā,
anya-e0806n2:212_12: ‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te’’ tyatra (5-4) tu dissati viseso,
anya-e0806n2:212_13: vakkhatihi tattha ‘‘tuṁtāyetave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṁ tadatthāya’’nti (5-61) tuṁpaccayaṁ vakkhati’’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:214_1: pakkhe dīghavidhānenevāti iminā akārādese kate pakkhe dīghavidhāneneva,
anya-e0806n2:214_2: aññatthacaritatthatāyāti ltvantādito aññattha bhopurisā bhopurisaiccādo jātipadatthanissayanena katatthatāya,
anya-e0806n2:214_4: avassaṁ dīghabhāve kāraṇamāha ‘yadicākāro’iccādi, yadica ākāroti padacchedo.
anya-e0806n2:216_3: tathā bho brahmāti ettha tathāti iminā brahmātirūpassa niruttiyaṁ niddiṭṭhattāva ettha saṅgahitabhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n2:216_4: Evaṁ vivarantīti tasmā sa sakhato gassa akāraākārā’’tiādinā evaṁ vivaranti,
anya-e0806n2:216_5: te hi aca āca ica īca ecāti dvande pubbasarānaṁ lopaṁ katvā ettupasilesaniddesaṁ vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n2:216_7: kimatthanti kiṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa taṁ kimatthaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:216_8: Sāmaññavidhānaṁ kimatthampanevaṁ payojanāsaṅkāyaṁ payojanāsaṅkāvicāraṇaṁ manasi nidhāya ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttattā āha– ‘atthato’ccādi, atthatoti sā matthiyato,
anya-e0806n2:216_10: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘āgatigaṇoyanti iminā tadākārasaṅkhātajātippadhānagaṇattappakāsanena yadi sambodhane ekārantākārantalābhīnaṁ kattu isi sakha muni bhadantādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ payojanaṁ na siyā,
anya-e0806n2:216_11: aññathā anupapajjanaṁ siyāti evamaññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato sāmaññavidhāne payojanamāhe’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:216_12: soyanti iminā vuttiyaṁ ‘āgati gaṇoya’nti vuttaṁ vacanaṁ nidasseti.
anya-e0806n2:218_0: Ssañca ssāca ssāyoca añca tiñcāti itarītarayoge cattha samāso,ssaṁ ssā ssāyaṁ tiṁsu.
anya-e0806n2:220_0: Ghoca oca gho ghāntaokārantā, natthi gho yesante agho, tesaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:220_1: sāmaññavidhānatoti kassaci liṅgassa aparāmāsā sāmaññena vidhānato,
anya-e0806n2:220_2: nādekavacanesūti nādīsu ekavacanesūti attho, hi hetumhi,
anya-e0806n2:220_8: uparicātyādīsvayamadhippāyo ‘‘suttassa ‘aṁyosvaghona’nti viracitattā sāmaññene-kavacanesvaghassa narassattappatīti tappaṭisedhābhāvā’daṇḍi kula’nti rassattaṁ ‘sismiṁ napuṁsake’ti vidhisuttaṁ vadeyyā’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:220_11: ettha pana napuṁsake ekavacanantaṁ daṇḍi kulanti vakkhamānattā nodāhaṭaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:220_12: yosu pana ‘‘yolopanisudīgho’’ti (2-88) adīghassāpi dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā paṭhamameva dīghassa rassābhāvekāva kathāti nodāhaṭaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:220_13: daṇḍīdaṇḍīni icceva tu bhavati, nossavāti pāṭho dissati,
anya-e0806n2:220_14: ettha vijjamāne ge pare okārantassa vā rassāpajjanadosampasaṅgato nossā’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:224_0: Senāti sutattā seiti vuttiyaṁ nimittaṁ parikappitaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:226_0: Saddantarattena koci dosoti sambandho, ādisitabbā ādesā kātabbā.
anya-e0806n2:230_0: Loke devadatto dattoti ekadesena samudāyavohāra dassanato sminotīmassa smiṁ vacanassātyayamattho dassitotyāha-‘smiti iminā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n2:232_0: Brahmādīsu ‘ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho’ti pāṭhāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:234_0: So bhasmā anto yassa so tadanto samudāyo, tassa,
anya-e0806n2:242_0: Ṭamuttapakkhoti asantaṁ kubbantassāti ṭādesena muttapakkho,ntussacevanti pasiddhattāva ṭādesamuttapakkhaṁ upameti,
anya-e0806n2:244_0: Ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti kasmā vuttaṁ nanu tadantassa samudāyassa patte ‘‘chaṭṭhiyantassā’’ti (1-17) antasseva hoti, tathāsati nevātippasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n2:244_2: tathāpi ‘jhissā’ti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyatte issāti vuttatta vuttanthi sāmatthiyato tadantassa ṭādeso-tippasajjatīti tathā vuttanti,
anya-e0806n2:244_4: tathāpi yadi samudāyassa ṭādeso-bhimato siyā ‘tathā sati kiṁ jhaggahaṇena issatveva vadeyyāti nātippasajjatīti,
anya-e0806n2:244_5: jhaggahaṇe nāmante ikārasseva jhasaññattāti idaṁ pana visesanattena vattu manicchite yujjati.
anya-e0806n2:248_0: Hetukurusaddehi yosu iminā ṭādese ‘‘lopo’’tīminā yolope vā sampatte ‘‘paccayanissitaṁ bahiraṅga’’nti yolopato ‘‘pakatinissitamantaraṅga’’nti ‘‘antaraṅgabahiraṅgasu antaraṅgavidhi balavā’’ti paṭhamaṁ ṭādese nimittābhāvāva lopā bhāvoti dassetumāha-‘hetukurusaddehi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:250_1: na tu sabbasaddo saddasse (potthake) tyāha-‘avayavene’tyādi,yadipi ‘sabba saddo ādi yesa’nti avayavena viggaho,
anya-e0806n2:250_2: tathāpi samudāyovāssattho bhavati… yesantyanena samudāyassa parāmāsāti bhāvo, itīti hetumhi,
anya-e0806n2:250_3: ko bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ bahunnaṁ vā eko deva datto kaṭhādīhi vā atthe dvīhi bahūhi vā ekassa niddhāraṇe sati kimhā niddhāraṇe ratara ratamesu ṇādivuttiyaṁ ‘‘ekatthatāya’’nti (2-119) vibhattilope ‘‘rānubandhentasarādissā’’ti (4-132) antasarādilope kiṁsaddassa rūpasiddhīti dassetumāha katamā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_4: ubho aṁsā assāti atthe ‘‘ayubhadvitīhaṁse’’ti (4-49) aye‘‘saro lopo sare’’ti (1-26) saralope rūpasiddhīti āha-‘ubho aṁsā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_8: sābhidheyyā pekkhāti ettha so sako abhidheyyo attho disādi sābhidheyyoti gahitoti āha-‘pubbādīna’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_9: sābhidheyyanti kammato parā apapubbā ‘ikkha=dassane’tīmasmā ‘‘kvacaṇa’’iti (5-41) aṇpaccaye sābhidheyyāpekkho,
anya-e0806n2:250_12: ettha ca parādisaddābhidheyyo-ttho disādesādi pubbādisaddābhidheyyassātthassa disāya desādino vāvadhibhāvena niyamavasena pavattati,
anya-e0806n2:250_14: socāvadhibhāvo niyamavasena pavatto pubbādisaddavacanīyaṁ disādesādi mapekkhatīti sābhidheyyāpekkhovadhiniyamoyeva vavatthāti vuccatītyayamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:250_17: kosallena nimittenāti kusala saddassa pavattinimittena kosallena,
anya-e0806n2:250_19: ‘nāññañca nāmappadhānā’’ti (2-136) aneneva saññāyaṁ sabbādikāriyassa nisiddhatte kimasaññāyaṁbhyanenetyāha ‘nāññañce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:250_20: kiñci pubbattādikamuddissa kesañci pubboparotyādikā atthānugatā saññā anvatthasaññā.
anya-e0806n2:252_1: yuttatā cāssa pāṭhe byabhicāra dassanatoti vattumāha-‘napuṁsake’ccādi, pāṭhānugatā hi suttaracanā,
anya-e0806n2:252_2: vikappānuvattiyā anapuṁsakamidameva vacanaṁ tassa kvaci byabhicāratte ñāpakanti vattumāha-‘tassa cā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n2:252_4: aññathā yathāvaṭṭhitapāṭhānukkamenātthaggahaṇe sati suttassa suttassā (potthake) mukhyattappatītito kathantamaññassa ñāpakaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n2:254_0: Nanu ca ‘‘lakkhaṇapaṭipadavuttesu paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇa’’ntīmāya paribhāsāya lakkhaṇikassākārassa gahaṇaṁ na pappotītyāsaṅkiya paṭipādayamāha-‘rassākāre’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:254_2: sādhvasādhujānana hesuttā sutta sattha muccate, paṭigatampadaṁ paṭipadaṁ, uccāritamañjasetyattho,
anya-e0806n2:254_6: kevalaṁ lakkhaṇadassanenāsmiṁ lakkhaṇe satyavassamanena rūpena bhavitabbanti lakkhaṇena paṭipāditaṁ, taṁ lakkhaṇavuttamityuccate,
