anya-e0806n2:254_9: tasmiṁ lakkhaṇavutte paṭipadavutte ca rūpe sati paṭipadavuttasseva gahaṇaṁ, netarasse’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:254_11: so ca niyamo aniyamapubbake sandehe satyavatiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n2:254_12: tasmā yatra lakkhaṇavuttameva kevalaṁ, na paṭipadavuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:254_14: yatrāpi paṭipadavuttameva kevalaṁ, na lakkhaṇavuttaṁ, sopyetissā avisayo,
anya-e0806n2:254_15: yatra dve rūpāni sambhavanti tatrevā yamparibhāsā sandehāpākaraṇamukhena pavattāti ñāyappattoyevā mattho imāya paribhāsāyānuvādyate,
anya-e0806n2:254_17: tathāpi lakkhaṇavuttaṁ rūpaṁ lakkhaṇe nonnīyamānaṁ dhūmaggi viya jalabalākā viya cānu mānikaṁ, yantu paṭipada vuttaṁ rūpaṁ, taṁ paccakkhasiddhaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:254_18: paccakkhānumānesu ca paccakkhambalavantaraṁ pamāṇanti ato paṭipadavuttameva gayhatīti.
anya-e0806n2:258_3: antaraṅgeccādinā ‘‘antaraṅgabahiraṅgesvantaraṅgavidhi balavā’’ti paribhāsamupalakkheti, aṅgasaddo-vayavavācī, ante saddo sattamyatthe,
anya-e0806n2:258_4: aṅge bhavamantaraṅgaṁ vibhatthyatthe-saṅkhyasamāso ‘‘eonama vaṇṇe’’ti (1-37) attaṁ rāgamo,
anya-e0806n2:258_5: aṅgato bahi bahiraṅgaṁ ‘‘payyapābahitiro purepacchā vā pañcamyā’’ti (3-5) asaṅkhyasamāso,
anya-e0806n2:258_9: kintu bahiraṅganissitaṁ kāriyambahiraṅgaṁ yathā mañcanissitesu saddāyantesu ‘mañcā saddāyantī’tyuccate taṁ viyeti atoyevā saṅkhyasamāsepi liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo ‘antaraṅgo antaraṅgā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:258_11: yathā-paccakkhassākkhanissitattāvabodhatthaṁ ‘akkhamakkhampati vattate’ti vicchāya-masaṅkhyasamāsepi kate paccakkha ñāṇassākkhanissitattañāpanatthaṁ saṅketavasena kato-yamasaṅkhya samāso,
anya-e0806n2:258_13: tathevāya-mantaraṅganissito-yaṁ samudāyanissitoti ñāpanatthaṁ saṅketavasena kato-yamasaṅkhyasamāsoti liṅgavibhattivacanantarayogo na virujjhate,
anya-e0806n2:258_16: Antaraṅga kāriyassa balavattaṁ sādhetuṁ ‘sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyattā’tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:258_17: idampana antaraṅgakāriyassa balavabhāvasādhane kāraṇaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:258_18: antaraṅgattā balavabhāvoyeva hi sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyatta kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:258_19: tathā cāha-‘yo lopato akārassa paṭhamameva bhavane kāraṇamāha antaraṅgattā akārassā’ti, tasmā nāyaṁ pāṭho ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n2:258_20: antaraṅgabalavabhāvasādhanassa pana lokato icchitattā ayamevatthe pāṭho ghaṭate’’antaraṅgameva kāriyambalavaṁ loke tathādiṭṭhattā, tathā hi loko pātovā’’tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:258_21: loke tathādiṭṭhattāti antaraṅgabalavabhāvassa loke evaṁ vakkhamānanayena diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n2:258_22: athavā kenaci vidhurappaccayopanipātena kāraṇave kallena vā kadāci kattumasakkuṇeyyattepi antaraṅgassa avassaṁ vidheyyattaṁ dassetumāha sabbapaṭhamaṁ vidheyyattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:260_0: Ivaṇṇassāti vuttattāti ‘ye passivaṇṇassā’’ti ettha ivaṇṇassāti vuttattā.
anya-e0806n2:262_2: ekānekesūti vuttattā saṅkhyāvisese vidhīyamānāsyādayo kathamasaṅkhyehi uppajjitumussahante iccāsayenāha- ‘kathamasaṅkhyehi syādīnaṁ sambhavo’ti.
anya-e0806n2:262_3: Atha nissaṅkhyehi hotusyādīnamasambhavo uccaṁ rukkhassiccādotu saṅkhyāsambhave bhavitabbameva syādīhiccāha-‘saṅkhyāsambhaveve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:262_5: kimesamuppattiyampayojanaṁ yenāsaṅkhyehi taduppatti no-numīyate ccāsaṅkiyāha-‘tassañca satiya’ntyādi,
anya-e0806n2:262_6: asati hi syādīnamuppattiyamuccamādīnamasaṅkhyānampadattaṁ natthīti yo ādīsu padasmā paresaṁ tumhāmhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ vonoādikaṁ padanimittaṁ kāriyaṁ na siyāti ‘uccaṁ vo,
anya-e0806n2:262_8: sati tu syāduppattiyaṁ luttesupi tesu padattanipphattiyāyeva taduppattito padatte siddhe padalakkhaṇaṁ kāriyaṁ sijjhatevāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n2:262_9: Parehi ettha ‘tassaṁ sālāya’nti vacanicchāyaṁ ‘tatra sālāya’nti yathā siyāti ‘‘abyayatvā syādino’’ti (pā,
anya-e0806n2:262_12: Atha kenātra āppaccayo vidhīyate yenāssāpi lopo-nusāsīyate ‘‘itthiyamatvā’’ti (3-26) ce netadatthi,
anya-e0806n2:262_14: tasmā asaṅkhyehi āppaccayassa sambhavoyeva natthītyanatthakamāppaccayassa lopavacananti nānatthakaṁ itthiyanti (3-26) hi guṇippadhāno niddeso itthattavati āppaccayādayo vidhīyante ‘tassaṁ sālāya (micce tasmiṁ padatthe) tatre’ti asaṅkhyamidamitthattavati vattate,
anya-e0806n2:262_15: tasmā siyāye vetasmā āppaccayotyavassamāppaccayassa lopo vidheyyoti yo maññate, tampati āha-‘yadīpi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:262_17: itthiyanti niddesassa guṇippadhānattaṁ sādhetuṁ ‘itthattavati hi āppaccayādayo’tiāha,
anya-e0806n2:262_24: padattho ca itthattaṁ siyāti yopyāheti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:262_26: tassāyuttanti tassevaṁ vādino jinindabuddhino vacanamayuttaṁtyattho, kutoccāha- ‘evaṁ hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:262_28: evaṁ sati sālāyamiccādisaddantarāpekkhā itthattappatīti tatretyādīsu siyāti attho, neva tathā patīyatīti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n2:262_31: aviddasu ayanti ubhayatrāpyatrekavacanasissa nivattiyā kataṁ yamekattaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:262_33: itthatta vuttinā sālādisaddena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ tatretyetassāti etāvatā āppaccayo uppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattunti dassento āha-‘samānādhikaraṇattampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:264_1: ekottho yassa pakatyādisamudāyassa so ekattho ‘assa cekatthasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ īyādi vidhānantyāha- ‘ekatthatā īyādividhāna’nti,
anya-e0806n2:264_2: īyādivuttiyanti vattanaṁ vutti īyādīnaṁ vutti, īyādividhāne satityattho, samāsatoti samāsitā,
anya-e0806n2:266_0: Yadā cātrādhisaddappayogo tadā teneva vibhatyatthassa vuttattā na sattamī payujjate, yadā sattamī, na tadādhisaddo,
anya-e0806n2:266_1: tenā sakapadeneva viggaho evaṁ dassanīyoti āha- ‘itthīsu kathā pavattā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:268_2: Aññatra vidhīyamāno-yamamādeso pañcamiyampaṭisiddhattā pañcamiyā paṭisedhena sayampi paṭisiddho nāma hotītyāha ‘ādesassevāyaṁ paṭisedho’ti,
anya-e0806n2:268_3: lopapaṭisedhassa ‘nāto’ti pubbavākyena vuttassa ayampaṭisedho neti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:268_4: atha kathamidamapañcamyātyamādesenevātisambandhati na lopa paṭisedhenāti paribhāsamāha-‘anantarassa vidhi vā hoti paṭisedho vā’ti,
anya-e0806n2:268_6: antarāḷamattapaṭisedhe payojanaṁ natthītyantarāḷagatassa vidhino paṭisedhassa cābhāvānantarotyupa carīyate anantarā gāmātyādi viya,
anya-e0806n2:268_7: diṭṭhatte pana majjhassa na vijjate-ntara mesanti viggahe suttepyanantarassa vidhānantarassāpi diṭṭhattā dvinnamekopyanantarotyuccate,
anya-e0806n2:268_11: yena kāraṇenādesenābhisambandhati tenātyattho, alopoti lopa paṭisedho,
anya-e0806n2:268_12: sāmatthiyāladdhanti dvinnamatthānaṁ vidhānāya dve vākyāni bhavanti,
anya-e0806n2:268_17: tathāsatyamapañcamiyātidaṁ vākyaṁ yadi na visesatthamālambate tamantarenānupapattito-ññathā kintyanenātthabalena laddhanti attho, alopoti jotetīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:268_19: na ekavākyattenāti byatireko ekavākyatāyañhi kāriya dvayassapi pañcamiyampaṭisedho siyā ‘pañcamiṁ vajjetvā taṁ kāriyadvayaṁ veditabba’nti, yadipi siddhāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:268_22: kimatthamihāyaṁ paribhāsā paṭhyate iha satthe-pavādā ussagge bādhanteti niyamo,
anya-e0806n2:268_23: tatra cussaggā duvidhā niyatappattayo aniyatappattayo ceti,
anya-e0806n2:268_26: evaṁ duvidhesussaggesu ye-niyatappattayo, tesameva bādhanamicchīyate, na niyatikānaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:268_27: tena tappadassanatthamayamparibhāsā paṭhyateti, yenetyussaggassa niddeso, neti paṭisedhavācī nipāto,
anya-e0806n2:268_29: yena ussaggena nāppatte patteeva samphuṭṭheeva visayetyattho… ‘dve paṭisedhā pākatamatthaṁ gamentī’ti katvā, vidhīyatīti, paṭisedho vidhānañca, ārabbhate vidhī
anya-e0806n2:269_2: yena tvappatte visaye ārabbhate tassa bādhanaṁ na bhavatītyattho, kutoti ce anavakāsattā,
anya-e0806n2:269_3: tathāhi yadi ussaggena sabbo visayo gahito siyā,
anya-e0806n2:269_5: tasmā anavakāsattā (na) apa (vāde) pana tassa bādhanambhavatītyavaseyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:269_7: tampati sāvakā sattā tambādhateti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:269_8: ‘pañcapūlimānaye’tyatra pañcannaṁ pūlānaṁ samāhāroti visesanasamāso ‘‘nadāditovī’’ (3-27) samāharaṇaṁ samāhāroti samāhārassapi bhāvarūpattā āha ‘bhāvappadhānattepī’ti, guṇabhūtadabbāni pūlāni.
anya-e0806n2:271_3: tattha liṅgena sutte niddiṭṭhato aññena kenaci visiṭṭhaṁ nāmaṁ liṅgavisiṭṭhaṁ, tassa,
anya-e0806n2:271_5: tattha nāmaggahaṇe satiliṅgavisiṭṭhassāpi gahaṇaṁ hoti… sāmaññe sabbavisesānuppave satotyadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:271_8: so itthiyampattiyaṁ sati anitthiyanti kato siyāti anitthiyanti paṭisedhavacanamevemaṁ paribhāsaṁ ñāpetīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:273_0: Anapuṁsakassāti pariyudāsoti anapuṁsakassāti ettha nañsaddassa pariyudāso-tthotyattho.
anya-e0806n2:277_1: simhi tu kappaccayā paṭhamameva kato massa sādesoti tappaccaye sati ‘kevā’ti kiṁ sāmaññena sādesavidhānene tyāsaṅkiya suttassa sāmañña vidhāne phalaṁ dassetuṁ ‘kenekatthatāyaṁ’tyādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:277_3: pubbabhāgassāti asubhāgassa padattābhāvāti ‘‘ekatthatāyā’’ti (2-119) vibhattiyā padattasādhikāyāpagamena padattābhāvā,
anya-e0806n2:277_7: tasmiṁ nimittābhāve hetuvināsetyattho, nimittā āgato nemittiko, phalabhūto dhammo, nimitte bhāvo vā nemittiko,
anya-e0806n2:277_8: nimittassābhāve taṁ hetuto pavattassa nemittikassa phalassāpyabhāvo bhavatī’’ti,
anya-e0806n2:277_11: tathehāpi nimittato pavattānaṁ nimittābhāve abhāvoyeva yutti māti maññate, aññatracāti sito aññatra ca.
anya-e0806n2:281_1: ‘‘tadādesā te viya hontī’’ti paribhāsato sādyādesīnaṁ gahaṇāssāyādesādīnaṁ gahaṇasambhavepi kiṁ ssāyādiggahaṇe na suttagurukaraṇene tyāsaṅkiya‘ssāyādiggahaṇa’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:284_0: Aññathāti guruniddesamakatvā aññena lahuppakārena niddisane sati,
anya-e0806n2:284_2: aññathātiādinā nekadesotivacanapariyantenetena ‘na tvekavibhattiyuttāna’nti paribhāsekadesassa adhippāyo pakāsitoti ñātabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:286_1: aññathā hi sabbādiggahaṇe ko pasaṅgo piyasabbādīnaṁ, yato appadhānappaṭisedho,
anya-e0806n2:288_3: māsena katāti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ… māsena katānaṁ pubbānanti vattabbattā,
anya-e0806n2:288_5: ettha tu māsena karaṇabhūtena pubbabhūtānanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:290_2: cattho ettha sambhavati kintu sabbādi na catthasamāsavisayoti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:292_0: Kiṁ bahulaṁvidhānā ‘vuddhyabhāvo’ otthābhāvo (pañcikāyaṁ) ti pāṭhena payojanaṁ yene tadatthameva ‘‘sumedhādīnamavuddhi ce’’ti gaṇapāṭho kato,
anya-e0806n2:292_5: bāṇādīsu abhidheyyesu manādīsu na paṭṭhīyantīti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:292_7: ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavā ahasaddo manādīsu na daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:292_8: rahasīti nipātattā ikārassa ca asabbhavā rahasaddo ca manādīsu na daṭṭhabboti sajjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:292_9: ikārassa kaccāyane smino karīyamānassa ikārādesassa ca,
anya-e0806n2:292_12: tenāti yena ahasaddassa manādikāriyāsambhavo rahasītica nipāto, tena, ihamanādīsu.
anya-e0806n2:296_4: sutattāti sotaviññāṇena gahitattā paccakkhattāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n2:296_5: anumitassa ‘‘vidhibbisesanantassā’’ti (1-26) liṅgato tadantasaṅkhāta atthadassanasaṅkhātaanumānaññāṇena viññātassāti attho.
anya-e0806n2:298_0: Daḷho dhammo dhanu assa daḷhadhammā. Rājādīsvimappaccaye paṭhite
anya-e0806n2:299_0: Tadanto paccayaggahaṇa paribhāsāya gayhatī tyāha- ‘iminā iccādi.
anya-e0806n2:301_0: Paccayaiccādinā ‘‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa’’nti ñāyaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:301_1: tattha yato vihito taṁ vinā na bhavati paccayotyanena ñāyena pattoyevāttho ākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito, tadādino gahaṇa’nti,
anya-e0806n2:301_3: so pakativiseso ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi,
anya-e0806n2:301_4: so paccayo-nte yassa samudāyassa so tadanto,
anya-e0806n2:301_7: iha tu tadantaggahaṇamevānurūpanti’ dassetumāha-‘‘kattari ltuṇakā’’ti iminā tyādi,
anya-e0806n2:301_8: tadāditadanta samudāyassa tu gahaṇe phalaṁ ‘byajigisī’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:301_9: tañca ‘‘tuṁsmā lopocicchāyaṁ te’’ti (5-4) sutte sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0806n2:303_2: ltvanto mandhātusaddo atthīti ‘sakamandhātu’ saddopi ltvantoti sajjhāhāro padasambandho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:305_1: tathāpi saṅkhyānadvārenidhasaṅkhyeyye vattatītyāha-‘cuddasahi saṅkhyāhī’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:309_0: Dutiyāggahaṇenāti ‘dutiyāyossa ne vā’tyevaṁ sutta racanāyaṁ dutiyāggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n2:313_2: itthipumannapuṁsaka samūhoti etthāyantesaṁ sādhanakkamo ‘dvandachaṭṭhīhi samāse itthipumanapuṁsakasamūho’ti ṭhite ‘‘samāse ca vibhāsā’’ti (2-2-35) pumantassa amādese ‘‘vaggantaṁ vā vagge’’ti (1-42) niggahītassa vagganto.
anya-e0806n2:315_0: Kammādittā enassāpi abhāvapakkheti ‘‘nā sse no’’ti (2-80) kammādito nāssa enādesakaraṇato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:317_4: kiñcarahi ekassābhidheyyassa pubbasaddena paṭipāditassa dutiyampatipādanamanvādesoti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:317_5: teneha na bhavati ‘devadattaṁ bhojaya, imañca yaññadatta’nti,
anya-e0806n2:317_8: kenaci visesenāyoge vuttasseva punabbacanānupapajjanaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ, tenevāha- ‘aññathe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:319_0: Navirujjhatīti iminā ‘‘itthiyamatvā’’ti (3-26) sāmaññena vidhānato syādyantamajjhepi itthiyampaccayo navirujjhatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n2:321_1: tathāsati ‘dvinnaṁ saddānaṁ dveādesā kamene’cceva kasmā vuttaṁ tyāsaṅkiyāha ‘na naṁvibhattikkamenāpī’ti.
anya-e0806n2:321_4: apekkhite kathaṁ bhaveyyā tyāha- ‘yadi hi’ccādi, apekkhiti yathākkamaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:321_5: evamaññate ‘‘kiñcāpi jātiniddesena dvepi naṁ rūpāni gayhanti,
anya-e0806n2:321_7: manudesassa tathā viññayamānattāti naṁsuicceva vadeyya, na tathā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:323_1: tathā sati kāriyittena tadantāva gayhanti kathaṁ ntantūyevā tyāsaṅkiyāha- teyeve’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:323_3: balavattā teyeva kāriyittena gayhantīti sambandho, na tadantā,
anya-e0806n2:325_3: Ekekasmiṁ yomhi dvinnaṁ ādesānaṁ sambhavā ādesīnampi bahuttasambhavoti sutte ‘dvinna’nti bahuvacananiddeso,
anya-e0806n2:325_4: vuttiyampana paccekaṁ yomhi paccekaṁ dvisaddasambhavā ‘dvissā’ti vuttaṁ, dutiyāyampi duve dve.
anya-e0806n2:329_0: Kaccāyanācariyo tumhāmhehi parāya catutthī chaṭṭhī savibhattiyā ‘‘sassaṁ’’ti (2-3-3) suttena amādesaṁ vidhāya ‘tumhaṁ amha’nti bahuvacanarūpāni sādheti… ekasmimpi attani guruādike ca gārava vasena bahuvacanarūpadassanatoti dassetumāha-tumhaṁ amha’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n2:329_2: imasmimpana satthe ekasmimpi sabbathā bahuvacana rūpasādhanakkamaṁ dassetuṁ ‘idha panā’tiādimāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n2:331_1: padasaññāvidhāya kavacanābhāvepīti pāṇini yānamiva syādityādyantānaṁ padasaññāvidhāyakassa suttassa abhāvepi,
anya-e0806n2:331_2: anvatthavasena padanti gayhamāne atippasaṅgopi siyāti āha-‘ruḷhiyāvātippasaṅgā bhāvo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:331_3: ākhyātaṁ sābyayakāraka visesanaṁ vākyanti keci, ekākhyātikaṁ vākyantyapare,
anya-e0806n2:331_4: taṁ sabbaṁ ekato saṅgahetvā ‘padasamūho vākya’nti vuttikārena vuttanti dassetumāha- ‘sābyaye’ccādi, ākhyātaṁ tyādyantamāhu, abyayamasaṅkhyaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:331_5: ākhyātaṁ sābyayaṁ sakārakaṁ savisesanañca vākyesaññaṁ bhavatītyattho,
anya-e0806n2:331_6: visesananti kārakavisesanassa kiriyā visesanassa ca sāmaññena gahaṇaṁ, sābyayaṁ-saddhiṁ vacati,
anya-e0806n2:331_10: padasamūho vākyanti vutte ayampi adhippāyavisesovasīyatīti vattumāha-vattu’miccādi,
anya-e0806n2:331_11: yatheccādinā anekākhyāti kampi guṇappadhānabhāve nopakārato vākyamekambhavati… pada samūho vākyanti vuttattāti vadati,
anya-e0806n2:333_1: tumhehi puññaṁ pasutaṁ anappakanti gāthāpāde tumhehitiādisū tattā na voādeso,
anya-e0806n2:333_2: tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagareti pubbavākyato vākyantarattā ekavākyatā natthi,
anya-e0806n2:333_3: tumhe viya diya dissanti amhe viya dissantīti viggayha ‘disa-pekkhaṇe’ iccasmā ‘‘samānaññabhavantayādi tūpamānā disā kamme rīrikkhakā’’ti (5-43) kappaccaye ‘‘nate kānubandhanāgamesū’’ti (5-85) ettābhāve ‘‘syādisyādinekattha’’nti (3-1) samāse ca ‘ekatthatāyaṁ’’ti (2-119) vibhattilope ca ‘‘sabbādīnamā’’ti (3-86) ā ‘tumhādisāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n2:335_0: Pacchā ādeso anvādesoti gahite kathitānukathananti kathaṁ ñāyatīti āha- ‘pacchā kathanañca kathitāpekkhanti katvā’ti.
anya-e0806n2:337_0: Saha vijjamāno pubbo yassa so sapubbo.
anya-e0806n2:341_0: Jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭilo, sova jaṭilako,
anya-e0806n2:341_3: asatte sampatteti idaṁ ‘‘āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā’’ti (2-239) suttassa sāmaññatā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:341_4: sāmaññavacanassa paṭisedhoti iminā visesavacane jaṭilakaiccatra ‘āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā’’tīmassa pattindasseti,
anya-e0806n2:341_5: devadattādisāmaññavacaneti devadatto devadattasaddo ādi yassa, tañca taṁ sāmaññavacanañca,
anya-e0806n2:341_6: tasmiṁ devadattādisāmaññavacane māṇavake māṇavakasadde parabhūte sati,
anya-e0806n2:341_7: ubhinnampi asatteti iminā idaṁ dīpeti ‘‘devadattāti visesavacanattā paṭisedhābhāvā pubbaparānamubhinnampi ‘‘āmantaṇaṁ pubbamasantaṁ vā’’tīdaṁ pappotī’’ti.
